story:
Since our first appearance in Illustrated Ape 29 (Dec 2012) Satanic Mojo have been producing world class underground comix.

Issue 7 brings to a close Satanic Mojo Comix volume one.

Issues 1 to 7 in look and feel have been designed as a tribute to the classic underground comix like Zap & Slow Death. We have taken inspiration from the undergrounds themselves as well as the Weird pulps and pre-code, golden age comics (especially EC). Aficionados of underground comix will find that Satanic Mojo sits  especially well between, Last Gasp favourites, Skull & Leather Nun. 
 

Since issue 1 (pictured above) our main recurring characters have been Lester Starbeard, Veronicka ‘High Priestess’ Warren,  ‘Kid’ James Bonny & Rupert Franklin the Third a gang of occultist, hippy freaks who share a Victorian townhouse in 1960s San Francisco. 
(issue 1 is long out of print  but a facsimile pdf version is available if you choose the pdf or Comix & pdf perk options)

Issue 7 goes deeper than ever before into the story of Lester Starbeard we see how he and his pals experience their very own death of the sixties moment in “Panhandle Pandemonium” the tale of a Black Acid* freak-out at a free festival gone wrong. 

(*See Vimeo satanic mojo manifesto with black acid intro https://vimeo.com/91959688)

This story also features an art-jam between Jason Atomic and legendary British underground cartoonist Savage Pencil featuring his iconic character Mister Inferno.

In 1990 Long Gone John published a book of Savage Pencil's depraved and demented art, called  ‘Bad Thorts’, on his Sympathetic Press imprint. This featured a tale in which Mister Inferno makes a deal with the devil to go back to 1969 so he can buy psychedelic records fresh off the press. Atomic says "This idea of a punk cartoon character out of time always intrigued me and I was delighted when Sav agreed to join me in penning this cameo appearance"

This issue also includes:

"Freak Out At Helgis" by The Weird Beard

"Making 2020 Goat Again" by Krent Able

"Charlie Says" by Billy Chainsaw

”Red Skull Says” by Billy Chainsaw 

"Goetica" by Gunsho

”The Beast” by Sina Sparrow

”Paranormal Z” by Nico T.D.M

”Manic Panic of Ray”  by Paul ‘Mutartis’ Boswell 

"Lockdown Faces" by Rafel Delalande

"The Devil's Nun" by Andrew Labanaris

"The Family Band" by Matt Valentine

"Pumpkin Head" by Garry Leach

”Hexen Honey” by Garry Leach

& more t.b.h...

Satanic Mojo Comix #7 comes together with a supplementary 16 page war comic “My Green Hell Runs Red” and an epic art-jam poster zine “Satanic Mojo’s Magick Supermen”

“My Green Hell Runs Red” , written and illustrated by Jason Atomic, is a gory and disturbing ‘Nam Flashback’ tale that shows what happened to Lester after he used black magick to get sent home from the war in issue 3. Also features a rare Vietnam war themed spoof recruitment ad “Travel With The All-American Men Of War” by Timothy Wyllie (from a never reprinted issue of Process magazine) & back cover image by Dominic Regan.

 “Satanic Mojo’s Magick Supermen” is an A5 sized full colour fanzine that folds out into an gorgeous, ‘suitable for framing’ A2 poster. The main image is a tribute to Peter Blake’s cover for the Beatles LP “Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band” in this case the characters in the crowd scene represent Heroes and villains of the cult and occult scenes, witches and satanists from fact and fiction, characters from Satanic Mojo Comix and characters that illustrate the portrayal of the dark arts in pop culture. 

These are illustrated by a super-group line-up of over 20 Satanist Cartoonists including:

Shaky Kane, Krent Able, Mike Diana, Andrew Labanaris, Anna Piera Di Silvestri, Manko, sina Sparrow, Shaltmira, Gunsho, Dennis Franklin, Rufus Dayglo, Russell Taysom, Rachel Gater & more.... 

The name (though we knew it not when we started this project) comes from a backwards message on the run-off groove of the Sgt. Pepper’s LP.

See here: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=y8qSX8yi0MI

With Satanic Mojo as much happens through coincidence or synchronicity as happens through design.

 

Also included in this package is a pdf of the long out of print Satanic Mojo Comix #1.

If orders of the pdf only option exceed 666 copies we will upgrade these orders to a special facsimile print edition exclusive to this campaign.

 

Limited quantities of issues 2-6 are still available in our Etsy store:

 https://www.etsy.com/sg-en/shop/SATANICMOJO?ref...

UPDATE,

Perks now expanded to include Back Issue Dealer Packs!


 

Ideal for your Headshop, Tattoo Parlour, Record, Book or Comic stores. All Satanic Mojo Comix have been limited to 666 copies worldwide. These back issues are only available in very limited quantities. Now is the chance to offer your customers a piece of underground comix history.

story:
Hello fellow comic fans! Our names are Adam Gagnon and Mike Virgilio. We've been friends since we were 14 years old and are so excited to share our new comedy comic series, Social Studies, with you. We are obsessive about every last detail of these books and feel strongly that this translates to the page.

 

What You Get For Your Support

We did our best to keep our funding goal low. Our only goal is to get our stories in your hands. We want to share the fun and friendship on these pages with you so we can get to know each other through a shared, though different, experience.

Indie comics live with people like you. This is a passion project for us, and we're cool with that. Printing and shipping can get expensive and restrictive at times. Small bits of help go a long way to keeping independent projects like this rolling.

Our core focus is on the story itself. But we wanted to have some fun with the perks!

  • Every backer will get a thank you, by name, in the back of the trade and on our website.
  • Every backer of a physical product will get a 4x6 print of our 'tagged' character image (below).
  • If we reach our goal every backer of a physical product will get the above perks as well as a bookmark designed specifically for this campaign to track your progress.
  • If we reach 1500 we'll add in a custom dye cut sticker.
  • More perks for every $500 beyond the $1,500 increment!

'Tagged' Character Art

We can be real here. We don't have established names in comics. It'd be cool for us to one day, but that isn't the main goal. With the quality of the writing and art we're confident in our product. Spreading the word is a challenge given the vastness of the internet. We're pushing past this by using our personal skills, connections, passions, and determination.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you can back us on this one or not, we appreciate you taking the time and reading this far. We offer a digital copy of our first issue on socialstudiescomic.com with a 'name your price' option. Want to check it out for free? Great! Enjoy! If you can pay later, we appreciate that too.

Let your friends know about Social Studies and this campaign. Word of mouth is everything for new artists. Indiegogo has some built in share tools and we can be found on the major social media platforms!

 

A Bit of History

When we first started drawing together in 1999 it was Bic Pens in Composition Notebooks. We'd make comics full of inside jokes and references to movies and games we loved. The books were passed amongst our friends so everyone could be part of it.

More recently we got together and decided it was time to take the project that would always come "some day" and finally do it right.

The writing starts with some (mostly) true stories. We up the absurdity or drama depending on the subject and throw in a bit of wish fulfillment or something we'd like to get across to our teenage selves. There is a lot of ourselves in the stories.

Being such a personal project, everything is done ‘in house’. The writing, layouts, penciling, inking, coloring, lettering, distribution, and marketing. The look of Social Studies has been obsessively worked. Story is important, of course, but this is a comic book. Art is a key piece and Social Studies stands out with its unique look.

Thank you so much for your support!

story:
“Korey and Clayton Barton are two guys I’m keeping a close eye on right now. Both are young, talented, not easily shaken and above all move with purpose. Driven. Dangerous combinations like this can shake the world. I backed Kozor because I believe in them and want to give their artistic journey the push it deserves and hope all of you will too.” - Jon Malin

“Kozor was an instant buy for me. The passion that the Barton Brothers have for creating awesome stories and art is infectious. Do yourself a favor and GET THIS BOOK” - FragaBoom!
 

Overview

KOZOR: Descent Into Madness is a 48 page full color comic book that tells a nightmare fueled story of foul demons, grizzled warriors and abundant bloodshed.

The mighty warrior, Chief Baron and his clan of swordsmen embark on a quest into the sacred swamp lands of Nimlaar in search for the mysterious 'faceless people'. But when they're attacked by a flock of flying beasts, their journey proves more fatal than they could have ever imagined!
 

 

Variant Covers

Featuring an insanely detailed variant cover by Korey Barton.



Variant cover by Caanan White.

 

Exclusive Black & White Line Art Edition

In this campaign we're also offering an exclusive black and white line art only version which showcases the intense exterior and interior line art of KOZOR: Descent Into Madness.
 

 

Exclusive Bonus Print For Every Backer

Every backer will get this exclusive, 8.3 × 11.7 inch bonus print, on top of the items included in their reward tier and the unlocked stretch goals. 

Line Art by Clayton Barton, Colors by Michael Pedro

 

Stretch Goals

200 Backers: Trading Card #1 "Chief Baron" *UNLOCKED*
Every backer receives Trading Card #1 featuring Chief Baron, the savage, axe wielding protagonist from KOZOR: Descent Into Madness. This card will be unique from those featured in our reward tiers.

300 Backers: KOZOR Bookmark & Sticker *UNLOCKED*
Every backer receives an exclusive KOZOR Bookmark and Sticker.

400 Backers: Trading Card #2 "Arthropodians"  *UNLOCKED*
Every backer receives Trading Card #2 featuring Chief Baron's alluring companions. This card will be unique from those featured in our reward tiers.

500 Backers: KOZOR/REPLICATOR Crossover Print By Korey Barton  *LOCKED*
Every backer receives a special KOZOR/REPLICATOR Crossover Print illustrated and signed by the hands of Korey Barton himself.

600 Backers: Perfect Bound  *LOCKED*
At 600 backers KOZOR: Descent Into Madness goes perfect bound.

 

The Team

Originally illustrated and written by Korey Barton
Remastered art work and edits by Clayton Barton

 

Risks & Challenges

The original version of KOZOR: Descent Into Madness is complete. But for the book's first ever printing, we've decided to add some additional pages to the original story, polish up the existing art work and re-edit the dialogue.

We feel confident that KOZOR: Descent Into Madness will be printed, packaged and delivered to your door step by the promised fulfillment date.

To ensure this happens, we've given ourselves more time than we actually need to finish off the final touches and get it shipped out without delay - if not earlier than expected!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have to wait till next pay day to back KOZOR: Descent Into Madness, no sweat. Just bookmark the page so you don't forget.

Other ways you can support our book is by telling your friends about it. Share this campaign on social media, feature it in a review, or invite us onto your show for an interview. We'd be happy to talk with you about the book.

story:
Prime Directive

I am Andrew Morrice, cartoonist responsible for a load of silly stuff on and off the internet. You may have seen some of it and hopefully enjoyed at least part of it. Some of you may even have hired me to draw some of it. This is a campaign to help raise support for possibly my biggest project to date. A collection of nine comic adventures in one volume starring the space-faring feline and his ancestors, doing what they do best. The Professor has invented a history revealing apparatus that enables the subject's past lives to be displayed and played out on the big telly. AstroCat volunteers as the test subject, giving us all a glimpse into the past as his ancestors start and carry on the noble tradition of hammy heroics. 

Mission Statement

This campaign is to raise funds for physical copies of the book. The cost for getting these made is £500 for approximately 100 copies. There will be over 100 pages of ridiculous heroism, with the majority in full colour. If the goal is not reached, there will simply be some re-evaluating. However the book will still be complete and printed in some form.

An additional funding for guest artists will come to £300, which will start if the initial campaign proves successful enough.

Anyone who sponsors the following amounts, will get the following rewards.

£10 - A personalised thank you sketch
£20 - The above plus a collection of sketches and artwork
£30 - The above plus a 'life' of their choice as a digital download prior to printing. And a sticker.


Everyone who sponsors will be mentioned in the credits page, except for those who wish to remain anonymous. Please state which if you can.

Engage Hyperdrive

Since this is the biggest book I've done to date, the support of old fans and new will be appreciated.

I have a very good track record of completing stuff I start in a timely manner, so there is no worry that the comics won't get done. Most of them are already finished and ready. The real complex stage comes in putting everything together and getting the book finalised. This is where the campaign comes in.

Evasive Tactics

If the campaign does not reach its intended target, it could still go a little to a long way in getting the book made, so every bit of help and support will be appreciated. Digital downloads will certainly be made available.

Warp Speed Ahead

Even if you feel you cannot afford to support financially, there are many other ways to help, simply by sharing the word around. Remember you can also share via Indiegogo's share tools!

story:
HEXER DUSK

The Obsidian galaxy. Five years after the devastating Chaos War. The Sky Cities have fallen from the sky, other-dimensional creatures called the Weird have emerged from the rift caused by the Sky Cities destruction. The Weird can't survive here for long unless they take a being to use as their shell. Living or dead--it doesn't matter to them. Hexers are the only ones who can destroy the Weird--and most of them died in the Chaos War. Hexer Xane Dusk is one of the last Hexers. 

Hexer Dusk will be a 72 page FULL-COLOR GRAPHIC NOVEL.

Who We Are

First, we'd like to introduce ourselves. We Jan Duursema and John Ostrander and are comic book creators who are passionate about our work!

Jan Duursema is a long time comic book artist who has illustrated series such as Star Wars Legacy, Hawkman, X-Factor and more. John Ostrander is a long time comic book writer who has written stories for series such as GrimJack, Hawkman and Star Wars Legacy. He is also the creator of the modern Suicide Squad and Amanda 'The Wall' Waller.

Hexer Dusk is extremely important to us and our first joint foray into indie comics creation. We've both worked in the comic book industry for a long time, but getting to create something of your own is something we've always dreamed of doing! 

Hexer Dusk was successfully funded on Kickstarter, so why are we here on Indiegogo? We're here because after the Kickstarter was over, we started getting messages from folks who'd missed the Kickstarter and who wanted to read this new graphic novel! We're here because we want you to read the story of Hexer Dusk--the first story of what we hope will become a series of stories that we can't wait to tell you. 

By backing Hexer Dusk, you will be a big part of making this series happen--and you'll get to read the premiere graphic novel full of compelling new characters, alien creatures and otherworldly settings. We want to ignite your imagination and take you to strange worlds on an exciting new adventure! It's what we love to do. We hope you will join us!

 Right now, Hexer Dusk is being illustrated with pencils and inks by Jan and John is scripting those pages. We're aiming for a shipping date in December of 2016. 

Here are some of the finished pages of story from HEXER DUSK! You can find more story pages and character information here on the Hexer Dusk website! http://www.hexerdusk.com

Risks & Challenges

We've created comics for publication for all of the major publishers for many years, so we are confident that we can bring you a beautiful, quality graphic novel. From our long experience working as professionals, we also know that unforeseen stuff can happen. If it does, we have a great team standing with us to help us through!

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't back Hexer Dusk right now, but would still like to help? You can! Let your friends know about Hexer Dusk and share, share, share word about us on social media! Indiegogo has some great share tools for you to use too!
story_txt:
HEXER DUSK
The Obsidian galaxy. Five years after the devastating Chaos War. The Sky Cities have fallen from the sky, other-dimensional creatures called the Weird have emerged from the rift caused by the Sky Cities destruction. The Weird can't survive here for long unless they take a being to use as their shell. Living or dead--it doesn't matter to them. Hexers are the only ones who can destroy the Weird--and most of them died in the Chaos War. Hexer Xane Dusk is one of the last Hexers. 
Hexer Dusk will be a 72 page FULL-COLOR GRAPHIC NOVEL.
Who We Are
First, we'd like to introduce ourselves. We Jan Duursema and John Ostrander and are comic book creators who are passionate about our work!
Jan Duursema is a long time comic book artist who has illustrated series such as Star Wars Legacy, Hawkman, X-Factor and more. John Ostrander is a long time comic book writer who has written stories for series such as GrimJack, Hawkman and Star Wars Legacy. He is also the creator of the modern Suicide Squad and Amanda 'The Wall' Waller.
Hexer Dusk is extremely important to us and our first joint foray into indie comics creation. We've both worked in the comic book industry for a long time, but getting to create something of your own is something we've always dreamed of doing! 
Hexer Dusk was successfully funded on Kickstarter, so why are we here on Indiegogo? We're here because after the Kickstarter was over, we started getting messages from folks who'd missed the Kickstarter and who wanted to read this new graphic novel! We're here because we want you to read the story of Hexer Dusk--the first story of what we hope will become a series of stories that we can't wait to tell you. 
By backing Hexer Dusk, you will be a big part of making this series happen--and you'll get to read the premiere graphic novel full of compelling new characters, alien creatures and otherworldly settings. We want to ignite your imagination and take you to strange worlds on an exciting new adventure! It's what we love to do. We hope you will join us!
 Right now, Hexer Dusk is being illustrated with pencils and inks by Jan and John is scripting those pages. We're aiming for a shipping date in December of 2016. 
Here are some of the finished pages of story from HEXER DUSK! You can find more story pages and character information here on the Hexer Dusk website! http://www.hexerdusk.com







Risks & Challenges
We've created comics for publication for all of the major publishers for many years, so we are confident that we can bring you a beautiful, quality graphic novel. From our long experience working as professionals, we also know that unforeseen stuff can happen. If it does, we have a great team standing with us to help us through!
Other Ways You Can Help
Can't back Hexer Dusk right now, but would still like to help? You can! Let your friends know about Hexer Dusk and share, share, share word about us on social media! Indiegogo has some great share tools for you to use too!

story:
Welcome to the HAMMER Comic book campaign...

Imagine a dystopian, post-apocalyptic world taken to the next level, where Ragnarok reigns. Midgard, our Earth, is a wasteland. The  legendary artifacts of Asgard are falling to Midgard where the fabled nordic gods of myths are coming to take them back!

 

HAMMER, An epic black & white comic book series spanning 10 staggering 48 page issues, is a labor of love and the culmination of my admiration for the storytelling medium of comics and my infatuation with post-apocalyptic movies and comics

The first epic issue of HAMMER is a 48 page black & white comic created, written and illustrated by Jason Crager.  Lettering and fonts are by vetreran comic inker Marco Galli and designer Robin Spehar.

 

Contributors on this Project:

El Joe (Lady Mechanika) Benitez color cover with John Livesay inks for this exciting first issue of HAMMER!
 

 

 

Castle and Key publisher, Jason (J.Gonzo) Gonzalez, will be contributing 6 pages of the silver-age Adventures of Star of Asgard and her Mighty Hammer.

The Epic Writing Talent of Dan Wickline : Comic writer and creator of Top Cows The Freeze, his prose novels Lucius Fogg , and his current contributions to the Dynamite Universe. Dan will he writing 4 pages of prose with a  accompanying illustration by Jason  (Lords of the Cosmos) Lenox and inked by Jason Crager.

 

Pin-up Gallery where my friends shine: 

 

Dan (BOOM!) Fraga, creator of Black Flag: Pineapple Perception, art director and epic talent.

Alex Tuis, concept illustrator for such movies as Silent Hill Revelation, Dark Shadows, Achoura, and Logan.


.

Erwin Papa illustrator, sculptor, and toy designer Nirasawa and Takaya are his spirit animal.

 

And the Incredible Talent of Micheal Acker.

 

UPDATED Stretch Goals :

 

$8K HAMMER logo patch added to all orders.

 

$10K Everyone gets an 11x17 color poster of the exclusive JOE BENITEZ cover!

 

 

                                                              The Story of HAMMER

 

HAMMER is a high octane thrill ride into the post-apocalyptic future of man. Artifacts have begun to rain down on to Midgard ( Earth ). The middle Realm is in chaos!
 

The World:

Society has broken down, trade and tech are the currency of the wasteland. The earth is in shambles, several hundred years after the fall of man.
 

 

Our story begins with a young zone tracker by the name of Star. The Zone is her wasteland home, where many a day she scraps to survive.
 

 

Stars life changes forever as she takes on the burden and the responsibility of becoming the next GOD OF THUNDER.

      

Danger and mystery block Star of Midgards every move. Wasteland bandits, Canners, Techeads, Scrappers and Manos the like all vying for the ultimate prize.

The HAMMER of the GODS

 

The Villians:

 

Loki, the Grinning God.

Hell bent on ruling the broken societies of Midgard and bending its peoples to his MAD agenda.


.

 

Gasser

Loki's right hand man.

He runs Loki's everyday operations seeking artifacts so his master may use them against the people of Midgard.

 

 

Jotunn incoming!

Large wasteland warriors, the toxic environment of the wasteland can wreak havoc on its inhabitants. 

 

 

The Draugr. 

Sentient robots of yester-year roaming the wasteland for any power sources that may be used to rebuild their fallen brothers and sisters.

 

 

Sculptures created as reference for the book

These 3 sculpture are available in the DRAUGR EDITION PERK

(DRAUGR SCULTURES SELECTED IN ORDER THAT I MADE THEM IN,)

PAINT SCHEMES NOT FINAL!

 

****NEW EDITION****

THE HEAD OF LOKI PERK!

These will be resin casted and where used in the design process of my book HAMMER.

ALL BACKERS OF THIS TIER ALSO GET A BASE TO GO WITH AT LOKI HEAD!

NEW ADDITION TO THE PERKS

THE SUPER SNOWBLOOD DRAUGR EDITION

11 INCHES TALL RESIN CASTING LIMITED TO 5 ONLY

GOING FAST!

 

 

 

 

ALL ORDERS COME WITH ADDITIONAL PERKS!

 

COMING SOON!

JOE WEEMS LOKI PIECE!

 

 

 

MARK BEACHUMS PAINTED PIECE 8X10

 

 

AND THIS AMAZING CARD BY JASON CRAGER!

STAR OF ASGARD

 COSTUME DESIGNED BY JASON GONZALEZ

 

 

 My love for Comic books began in the 8th grade with my introduction to the amazing title, Marshal Law.

 

Ironically it was shown to me by my now art partner Jason Gonzalez (creator of the luchador comic, La Mano Del Destino and owner of Castle and Key Publications who is producing HAMMER).

 

I knew right then and there I wanted to draw comics. So began the arduous task of learning the incredible art form of comics. My love for indie black & white comics grew from there into an obsession. As my comic book collection grew so did my talent.

 

In 1992, at the age of 18, I became an inking assistant for Harris Comics and since then, comics became my life after that. I moved up the industry ranks from ink assistant to inker, then to a penciler. A few years later, I learned the production and publication side when I became the art director at Avatar Publications (2000-2001). My time there was full, with art direction, prepress production and lettering by day and artist and inker by night.

 

My love for comics has never waned.

 

In 2009, after many projects and commission work, I began sculpting and it became my new obsession. I really felt like an artist then, but I wasn't done.

 

10 years later HAMMER was born

 

This Project is the culmination of 28 years of art experience put into a single comic title.

 

The Good News: 

The book is 70 % done, I'm waiting on a few of the contributors to wrap up their end of things than on to lettering and off to printing. I would like to deliver this product early to all my backers. I have set the delivery date at January 1st 2021, I feel this is much more time than I really need and will try for a November delivery date.

The Bad News

This is my first campaign.. Please feel free to ask questions about the campaign. I will answer any and all questions. I know that this platform requires sharing and participation for any campaign to be successful.

So I leave this in the hands of the Patrons. Without you I would never be able to take this journey and id love to bring you all along on this adventure ride!

HELP STAR SAVE MIDGARD!

VALHALLA!

story:
A Thrilling New Graphic Novel Adapted From New York Times Bestselling Author John Ringo’s Epic Book Series!

  • WRITTEN BY CHUCK DIXON!

  • ART BY DERLIS SANTACRUZ!

  • COLORS BY BRETT SMITH!

  • COVER BY DAVE DORMAN!

  • 56 FULL-COLOR PAGES

  • FRESH, ORIGINAL CONTENT IN AN AGE OF ENDLESS REBOOTS AND WARMED-OVER REHASHES!

NEW ARTWORK PREVIEW- AVAILABLE IN THE UPDATES SECTION- 9/14/2021. CHECK IT OUT!!!

The media calls it the Pacific Flu. The CDC calls it H7D3, and it spreads like wildfire. The virus combines the worst symptoms of Rabies and the common Flu, and is suspected to be man-made. The first reports of feral, cannibalistic “zombie-like” symptoms were met with disbelief and skeptical amusement, but nobody’s laughing now. Scientists, backed by the world’s governments and its wealthiest institutions, race against the clock to develop a cure as infections rise and cities fall.

A glimmer of hope appears as a vaccine is discovered, but its production requires harvesting the spinal tissue of the infected, a grim task that tests the limits of human morality. With no other choices apparent, time is quickly running out before hordes of infected overwhelm the last remaining bastions of civilization.

In the first days of the outbreak, a college history professor receives a cryptic warning from a trusted source. Its baffling, yet unmistakable message translates as:  "PACK UP, GET OUT,AND GO NOW!"

Steve Smith and his family don’t waste any time; they leave their normal, comfortable lives behind to get ahead of the inevitable panic and survive the end of the world!

Special 5-Page Sneak Preview

Main Characters: The Smith Family

 

 

Steve Smith: A paratrooper turned college professor; Steve heeds his brother’s warning to leave the family’s former life behind during the early days of the outbreak. A calm and soft-spoken man with an iron resolve, who will stop at nothing to protect his wife and daughters. Steve “flips the switch” back to the combat-hardened mindset of his Army days, and looks to the lessons of the history he taught to bored college freshmen in his pursuit of safe harbor.

 

Stacey Smith: A savvy mechanical engineer who keeps her family running as smoothly as the engine of their stolen boat, procured in no small part by her quick thinking. Stacey and Steve are low-key “preppers” who raised their daughters to be capable and independent-minded, with lots of self-defense training on top of sports and education. 

 

Sophia Smith: Older daughter of Steve and Stacey. Sophia takes after her mother, especially when it comes to logical thinking and planning. She is often frustrated at having a “little” sister who isn’t so little, and her conscientious wisdom often clashes with Faith’s impulsive nature. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Faith Smith: Younger daughter of Steve and Stacey, a high school student who is especially tall and strong for her age. The fire to Sophia’s ice. Extremely competitive, often hot-headed and impetuous, but tempered with a compassionate heart. Faith adapts very quickly to fighting the infected, to an almost frightening degree, and buries her fear by treating the “zombie apocalypse” as an exciting game. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tom Smith: Steve’s brother, former Special Forces. Head of Security & Emergency Response for Bank of the Americas, one of the elite institutions funding its own efforts to produce a vaccine. His keen sense of honor creates conflict between his obligations to the bank and his family loyalty. Tom struggles to maintain a fragile truce between ruthless bankers, vicious gangsters, beleaguered cops, and grasping bureaucrats...all entangled in a deadly game of brinksmanship and hidden agendas. 

Supporting Characters

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Jim Kaplan: As former Special Ops colleagues of Tom Smith, Kaplan and Durante are the most trusted members of the bank’s executive security team. Kaplan is non-descript in appearance, with a sixth sense for impending trouble. He and Durante share a strong sense of gallows humor.

 

Dave “Gravy” Durante: Kaplan’s executive security counterpart, tall and lanky with a perpetually relaxed demeanor. Durante is given the task of minding Tom’s thrill-seeking niece Faith, while he struggles to keep her out of trouble and himself clear of his boss’s wrath.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Staff Sergeant Marcus Copley: A veteran of the Iraq & Afghanistan wars, and section leader in the New York Army National Guard. Copley’s small squad of surviving troops encounters the Smith family during a bizarre melee in Washington Square Park.

 

OUR CREATIVE TEAM

                                          

Chuck Dixon- Writer: Chuck is a legendary comic book writer with thousands of titles to his name, including a record run on Batman at DC Comics (where he co-created the villain BANE) and seminal work on Marvel’s The Punisher. He has adapted a wide range of stories into comic and graphic novel form, including J.R.R. Tolkien’s The Hobbit , which is one of the most successful graphic novels in publication to date. Chuck is also the author of the Levon Cade book series, which is currently in TV development with Sylvester Stallone’s Balboa Productions.

Derlis Santacruz – Interior Artist: Derlis is a veteran comic book artist best known for his work on Marvel’s’ Fantastic Four, DC’s Batman, Batgirl, and Justice League, along with Dark Horse Comics’ Tomb Raider series.

Brett R. Smith – Color Artist/Project Manager: Brett is a professional commercial artist working in the comic book industry as a color artist, a storyboard artist in the advertising industry, and a graphic artist for multiple clients. He has worked with a wide array of clients, including Marvel and DC Entertainment, Hasbro, Cartoon Network, McCann Erikson, BBDO, and Saatchi & Saatchi. Brett has contributed to multiple premier properties and licenses including, The Avengers, Batman, Superman, GI Joe, Wolverine, Suicide Squad, Guardians of the Galaxy, Hulk, Detective Comics, and many others.

Dave Dorman- Cover Artist: With a career spanning 40 years, Dave is an Eisner award-winning artist who has also done extensive design work for Hollywood film productions and major toy companies like Hasbro. He is best known for his Star Wars book and comic cover art and was voted #1 artist of all time by fans of the franchise! Dave’s art has also been featured in Topps trading cards for franchises like World of Warcraft, Star Trek, Harry Potter, Battlestar Galactica, and Lord of the Rings.

Smith – Color Artist/Project Manager: Brett is a professional commercial artist working in the comic book industry as a color artist, a storyboard artist in the advertising industry, and a graphic artist for multiple clients. He has worked with a wide array of clients, including Marvel and DC Entertainment, Hasbro, Cartoon Network, McCann Erikson, BBDO, and Saatchi & Saatchi. Brett has contributed to multiple premier properties and licenses including, The Avengers, Batman, Superman, GI Joe, Wolverine, Suicide Squad, Guardians of the Galaxy, Hulk, Detective Comics, and many others.

story:
STRETCH GOALS

 

 

HARDBACK COVER BY GRAPHIC GOOSE

 

 

 

PAGE SAMPLES

 

 

 

 

 

 

Twisted Fairy Tales Art Print by Shane O'Sullivan

 

GINGERBREAD MAN PRINT BY LORD ERIK THE ARTY GUY

 

SIR CUMFERANCE ZINE BUNDLE BY DAVE HINGLEY

Follow the tales of Sir Cumferance in these zines where each zine bring you

8 pages of story totaling 40 pages!!!

 

BARGAIN BIN BADGE PACK

BIG PACKAGE EXCLUSIVE

 

Ratl & Roll #1

BIG PACKAGE EXCLUSIVE

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this awesome campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
HE'S BACK!

NYC's resident animal defender is back for more teeth-smashing,  skull-cracking action! Follow Hector Gil as he continues his search for  perpetrators of the most vile animal cruelty cases. He stops at NOTHING  to bring the guilty to justice!!!

TEAM

The wonderfully talented Sigma Comics team keeps the creativity  pumping, with another gripping story from H.H. German, interior art by  Javier Orabich, colors by Daniel Grimaldi, and cover art by Garnabiel.

SUPPORT

Join Sigma Comics in our fight against animal abuse! We're raising  funds to help with costs for printing, distributing and marketing the  third issue of CALICO VOLUME 1. Here's a great chance for you to  support this wonderful project. We had a successful crowdfunding effort for the first two issues and are looking forward to even better results in  this effort!

story:
Kinetic is the action-adventure story of a reluctant girl taking on the mantle of a hero!

I am incredibly excited to show you: Kinetic.  This tremendous book is mix of Invincible and Spider-Man as it fuses the intensity of incredible, fly by the seat of your pants action with the struggles of growing into adulthood. 

Why should you back this book?  You'll experience a captivating journey of a girl who summons the kinetic energy of multiple dimensions to strike ballistic blows to her foes.  Armed with her trusty "Battle Ribbon", Kinetic does her best to save, or at least try to save, the day any way she can.

You'll love this 40 page adventure written, drawn, and lettered by myself.  With your help and support you can help launch this awesome comic book series. 

You'll get a top of the line book that puts you on the edge of your seat from the moment you open it up to the final closing page. 

With your help, I can take this story from being a small-time character to something the whole comics world can enjoy.

A BRIEF OVERVIEW OF KINETIC:

One day, Savannah Steel's father,  does an experiment to unlock what he believes are actually hundreds if not thousands of parallel dimensions.  In a terrible accident, he is killed and Savannah is injured. 

Have you ever lost someone?  You'll know then the emptiness that comes with that loss, an irreplaceable vacuum in your heart. You'll know what Savannah has felt. 

Yet strangely she soon finds that she can somehow summon great deals of energy to strike and control objects she touches. 

Although unable to unlock those other dimensions, somehow she draws the kinetic energy of those parallel worlds and focuses it into this dimension.  The result is a powerful ballistic force generated as a weapon.

Honoring her father with what she now sees as his dying gift to her, she uses this ability to fight crime and the recent rise of terrorist activity as her alter ego, KINETIC. 

However, a strange new enemy has emerged and now Kinetic finds herself face to face with a monstrous and deadly foe.....

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET!

What I Need & What You Get

In order to bring you a top notch product, I need to ensure that I am printing with great printers on premium materials.  My goal is to put together a professional grade book consisting of 40 pages of story and additional pages of special material.  Early backers will also get a beautiful pin up poster of Kinetic to hang on their walls. 

My calculations show that I would need right around $1,200 in order to make this happen so that's what I'm aiming for. 

Anything above this amount means more for you!

More posters, trading cards, variant editions, extra story pages, and even reprints of my other works are all possibilities. I want this to be the best book you can possible have.

Here's whats on the agenda:

CAMPAIGN STRETCH GOALS:

1. Goal 5,000 USD  raised – I'm skipping everywhere and smiling.  YOU get a one-of-a-kind trading card that comes with your book.

2. Goal 7,500 USD raised - I've now found myself moonwalking place to place while holding the goofiest open-mouth grin you've ever seen.  YOU get a badass fold out poster that's going to blow your mind.

3. Goal 15,000 USD raised - I simply run with my hands held high and head thrown back singing Glory Hallelujah everywhere I go.  YOU get a full extra story, "Smoke, Drink, Spy", my comic about the coolest secret agents from the 1960s as they take on the wide world of espionage!

4. Goal 20,000 USD Raised - After laughing myself into a joyful coma, eventually I wake up with a forever whimsical expression of silly happiness on my face.  YOU get extra pages of content, I'll sign every book,  and you even get a special pamphlet that contains something very nice in it.

 

Risks & Challenges

Whenever you make a decision to back a campaign, project, or creator, you are putting your money on the line.  Trust me I understand this and want you to know that I'm not going to take your money and run off to a tropical island somewhere.

I've got the story written and 22 pages of art completed. Once I've fulfilled my funding goaI it will take me about a month to finish the book and then its off to the printers.  I have a rough estimate of October because with the whole pandemic going on, I want to give myself a buffer to account for any unforeseen delays.   From there, it's off to the post office for fulfillment!

I've produce comics wholly by myself before so you can be assured that part of it will go smoothly and I'll give you great art and an action packed story. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, if you've read this far but for some reason cannot back my campaign, I CONDEMN YOU TO A LIFE OF HORRIFYING TERRORS!  I'm just kidding!  

I get it, money is tight and you can't just go around backing every comic book campaign that pops up.

So if you can't back me with your hard-earned money, is there any way in the world you could possibly help spread the word? Could you tell a friend?  Share a post?  Yell loudly at the sky while waiving your hands in the air, in a fashion that implies that you just don't care?

Any little bit helps and I would be incredibly grateful.

Thank you kindly.

story:
Is this a Dream? Or is it real!?

 

MY DUDES!

 

This is Trent Kaniuga! A lot of you may know me for my YOUTUBE channel where I teach you how to design concept art for games that I’ve worked on - like World of Warcraft, League of Legends, Fortnite, Overwatch, and Diablo 3.  But Long before I did ANY of that, I STARTED MY CAREER MAKING COMICS.

By the time I was 17, I even published my first indie comic, CREED.

 

WHATS CREED ABOUT?

Mark Farley is a 17 year old comic creator, much like myself at 17! HIS comic documents his travels into a DREAMWORLD dimension, where he takes on the persona of "The Legendary Creator" - CREED.  Together with his best pal (CJ), a morphing dreamfrog/dragon, they stomp out nightmares and face Marks most personal demons, manifested as the deadly Skeeziks!

After years of neglect, Mark returns to the DREAMWORLD only to find all of his creations trapped in despair and slowly turning to stone.

Together with a much younger CJ, they uncover a plot hatched by a mysterious figure (Laney) who seeks the power of the DREAM STONE, which would allow her to destroy everything and RE-IMAGINE the Dreamworld according to her own selfish desire.

Together with new friends, Mark must uncover the truth about the origin of the Dreamworld, and rescue the entire dimension, or cease to exist along with it.

So.... WHY return to CREED now?

My longtime followers DEMANDED that I return to reboot the CREED series and make more comics!

To get back into writing and drawing the characters, I've decided to RE-imagine the 4 part webcomic CreeD: Imaginary. I’m repainting several pages, rewriting entire scenes, and adding more new content to satisfy long time fans, AND create a PERFECT STARTING POINT FOR NEW CREED READERS!

YOU WILL GET TWO 60 page books with your purchase!

2 BOOKS!

I want to do right by the longtime fans of CreeD, and deliver a COMPLETE CREED ADVENTURE in  A 2 BOOK BUNDLE, each containing a whopping 60 PAGES EACH!. I’m more excited than ever to return to CREED and kick off a new series. Let’s do this!

ADD A HEAD SKETCH TO YOUR COMIC!  

I'll draw CREED, CJ THE FROG, CJ THE DRAGON or DISORDER in your comic!  You can choose to add this to your order at check out as an ADD ON!  

UNFROGETTABLE TALES #4: CYBERFROG vs. CREED!

HERE IT IS!  The 1997 Collaboration between me and Ethan Van Sciver, CYBERFROG vs. CREED (or CREED vs. CYBERFROG depending on which variant cover you chose!)  

We're representing this rare classic IN FULL COLOR for the first time!  I am doing a new cover for it, and so is Ethan Van Sciver!  So take your pick, or choose both!  UNFROGETTABLE TALES #4: CYBERFROG vs. CREED is an ADD ON at check out for NO ADDITIONAL SHIPPING, so get BOTH BOOKS for one low shipping price!

STRETCH GOALS!

At $10,000 ALL ORDERS ALSO COME WITH A SHINY C.J. The Frog STICKER 

"Hi, I'm C.J.!"

At $20,000 ALL ORDERS COME WITH CREED DRAGON STICKER!

 

At $40,000 ALL ORDERS WILL INCLUDE A CREED TRADING CARD!

And we'll see what happens from there!  We'd love to make more CREED collectibles!  Maybe even a toy! It all depends on your support!

 

"IT'S GREAT! I CAN'T WAIT TO PUBLISH THIS BOOK!" - Ethan Van Sciver

"CREED IS SO RELATABLE. I LOVE IT!" - Matt Martin

 

CHECK OUT THESE SAMPLE PAGES!

Awesome Variant HALL OF HEROES alumni Jam Cover! Ethan Van Sciver+ Matt Martin+ Trent Kaniuga!  SNOWMAN, CYBERFROG and CREED! 

WIZARD MAGAZINE article introducing CREED!

story:
Story by Sylvester Stallone & Chuck Dixon! Art by Graham Nolan! The Creators of ROCKY and BANE tell an amazing tale of Supernatural Combat!

 

Stretch Goals!

As the campaign grows, STRETCH GOALS will be UNLOCKED that add value to your perk with no additional cost to you!

$150,000 STRETCH GOAL  *UNLOCKED*- Bookmark!

$175,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- Trading Cards!

$200,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- Large Sticker!

$250,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- Unit Patch!

$275,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- Kyle Ritter Pin-Up!

$300,000 STRETCH GOAL- Dog Tags!

 

THE EXPENDABLES are an international team of mercenaries based out of New Orleans, Louisiana.

This Band Of Bad-Asses is led by founding member BARNEY ROSS, a highly-decorated veteran of the United States Military. While the membership varies wildly (once topping out at 22 members) the core group is comprised of:

  • LEE CHRISTMAS- Brit. KNIFE-FIGHTER. Second-in-command. UNLUCKY in love.
  • GUNNER JENSEN- Swede. GIANT. Genius. SELF-MEDICATES with alcohol & street pharmaceuticals.
  • YIN YANG- Chinese. RAGE-QUITS the team every year or so. Back for now (he's BROKE).
  • TOLL ROAD- American. NEUROTIC. Small Unit Combat Operations are his version of GROUP THERAPY.

The team takes High-Risk/High-Reward missions and split the take EQUALLY. Contract work for the CIA keeps them out of JAIL for the International Laws they break as mercenaries.

Members come and go, but there's always a need for ROUGH MEN to commit VIOLENCE so that civilized people can sleep in PEACE...and THE EXPENDABLES are just the men for the job!

 

KILLED in Combat...They Awaken in HELL!

Here are several pages from the main story. Line Art by Graham Nolan. Colors by Daniel Brown.

 

50-page Main Story Accompanied by 3 Sidequests!

  • THE BRIDGE- Barney Ross is stunned to find the soul of his still-living friend Tool, trapped in Hell! Art by Jason Johnson (TEAM 7).
  • CHRISTMAS IN HELL- Lee Christmas is lured away from the team just when they need him most! Art by Kelsey Shannon (NORAH'S SAGA)
  • BARBARIAN'S HOLIDAY- Gunner Jensen makes the most of a bad situation! Art by Butch Guice (DOCTOR STRANGE).

 

MULTIPLE COVERS

The Main Cover will feature art by Kelsey Shannon. In addition, there will be Variant Covers by

  • Billy Tucci (SHI)
  • Richard C. Meyer (JAWBREAKERS, IRON SIGHTS)
  • Jason Johnson (TEAM 7)
  • Renzo Rodriguez (DESOLATION WAVE)
  • Dave Dorman (STAR WARS) *HARDCOVER*

 

Stay tuned to this page for updates!

story:
BUCKLE UP! Part 2 of the Gunship Thunderpunch graphic novel series is here!

 

Nova Marcos has to get her son back from martians! Her only hope lies with a convict, a gun-toting hillbilly, and a giant transforming gunship that was left to rust for 30 years.

 

The first exciting graphic novel in this series was 72 pages of story plus extra content, Book 2 will be just as packed! More action! More adventure! Pure sci-fi entertainment!

 

Wait, There's MORE! How about a THUNDERPUNCH SYNTHWAVE ALBUM? That's right, this book comes with an original synthwave soundtrack to complete the retro robot feel.

Every perk comes with access to this digital album!

You might not be familiar with the term, but you're familiar with the sound:

 

 

 

At the $75k stretch goal I'll make an animated music video for one of the songs!

 

UPDATE! EVERY BOOK COMES WITH TRADING CARDS!

 

 

DON'T MISS THE ADD-ONS AT CHECKOUT!

 

Available Add-ons at checkout include:

  • Digital copy of book 1 so you can get caught up
  • Art of Brian Shearer Vol 1 & 2
  • Merch pack

And more!

 

 

If you love robots, space adventures, and aliens, you'll love Gunship Thunderpunch!

Oh, and there's a variant cover by GI Joe artist, Robert Atkins!

 

STRETCH GOALS

  • $10K - Gunship Thunderpunch TRADING CARDS!
  • $15k - "How to Draw Robots" Tutorial Section!
  • $20K - A 5-PAGE BACK UP STORY by fan favorite Transformers artist, Alex Milne!
  • $75k - A Gunship Thunderpunch Synthwave ANIMATED MUSIC VIDEO

 

I'll add more goals as the campaign progresses! Get in early and let's get Gunship Thunderpunch to the moon!

 

REFERRAL CONTEST!

For the top 3 referrers to this campaign I'll be awarding original art and possibly other goodies (to be determined as the campaign unfolds!) Just make sure you're logged into your Indiegogo account when you share the link so it'll keep track of your user ID. Spread the word around and get rewarded for it!

 

 

DID YOU MISS BOOK ONE? YOU CAN GET THAT TOO!

Copies of book one are still available for this campaign, just choose the book 1 & 2 perk! (Cover version sent to you will be based on available stock.)

 

Get on board the Thunderpunch Crew!

YOU CAN GET THAT TOO!Copies of book one are still available for this campaign, just choose the book 1 & 2 perk! (Cover version sent to you will be based on available stock.) Get on board the Thunderpunch Crew!

story:
Summary

The Historians are a team of explorers who travel the multiverse and protects reality from evil, they are attacked by an extra - dimensional being who seeks to destroy them; which causes time to splinter, forcing the Historians into action across different timelines. These characters have existed in my mind for far too long; and now its time that they've made their appearance.  

  • I'm Dante Lee, writer and creator of the Historians and their supporting cast.
  • I have a strong passion for comic book storytelling, I come from an era of great comics and creative minds.
  • My goal is to share a new universe of comic book lore and excitement, new characters and storylines that'll stand the test of time. I had to challenge myself when it came to every aspect of these characters and their stories. 

(Note: I write from a place of truth and memory... My creations have been with me before I knew myself...)

The Goal!

The Breakdown:

  • I'm trying to raise enough funds to successfully provide you with a quality 70+ page graphic novel, in color (paperback, hardback, digital); on time or before the due date. My goal is: $8k which will cover artist fees, colorist fees and publication.
  • This is my first campaign and I'm happy to say that I'll have Posters, Character Cards and Exclusives (covers and book interior bonus).
  • If this campaign doesn't reach the goal but has some backers, the backers who provided support will get their book and other materials on time. 

Impacting Dreams

The Truth:

  • I am ultimately here because I need your support and your belief in my creativity.  
  • I have a strong passion for comic books, they have been a part of my life since...forever.
  • I need your support. Believe in the Historians, and that there is something greater around the corner. 

The Future

Book One of the Historians is 50% complete and I've already outlined  part two & one spin off.  

  • I've overcome most issues during these strange times we live in now.
  • The only thing to do now is to continue moving forward and deliver a solid product upon completion. 

Credits

  • Dante Lee - Writer, Creator & Concept Artist
  • Andry "the Legend" - Interior Artist
  • Panulee "the Great" - Interior Artist
  • Raul Trevino - Character/Cover Artist
  • Thomas Blake - Cover Artist
  • Remy Paul - Cover Artist
  • Chamba - Cover Artist
  • Carlos E Gomez - Cover Artist
  • Student Sole - Cover Artist
  • Mariam Yasser - Colorist/Special Effects

 

Super Unlocks: $8K goal met - Every Tier/Perk gets a Renaissance Equation Sticker.

                                 $10K goal beyond - Every Tier/Perk gets a Collectible Character Card.

                                 $15K goal infinity - Immediately begins production of the Universe                                             Handbook, complete w/ cover, interior art, Bio's & more -  Kid Katja &                                       Teddy Miracles figurines. Historians Part 2. (Universe Handbook will                                 be free to everyone during the next campaign of the Historians.)

Other Ways You Can Help

I'm not a strong online personality, however I will make myself available via email and other forms of communication. Please share us across any social media that you use! Spread the word! The Historians are coming!!

https://www.twitch.tv/ninja_house

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxLR-EQtL1Kqse...

https://twitter.com/Ninja_House_AD

ninjahouse.1400.ad@gmail.com

story:
The Comic & Merch Campaign is Here!

40 pages (color) of mouth watering tasty salad will be tossed together in an epic comic book format! Retelling the story of 'The Iliad', 'Hail Salad: The Trol-jan War' is an origin story featuring the beloved YouTube 'Hail Salad' cartoon characters you've come to know and love. The story recounts their collected efforts to decimate the whacked-out troll clan of the desert planet, Troll-lala.

NEW FOR 2021!
Wave 5 standees with Shane, Witten, and more! Collect the entire crew of the Starlight Kitten Club!



Get the Incredible Charlie Snogan Cover in the NEW 'Caeser & The King' Perk!

New 48 page Prestige Format Edition comes with 8 pages of pin-up art in the back, including all of the covers, and pieces by Dan-Fraga, Dax Martian, Narwhal & Thomas Patrick Parnell.
Set also includes:
1x oversized 'Man of Leisure' Glitter sticker
1x 9"x12" Gold Metallic Signed Print

Charlie Snogan's 'Caeser & The King' Cover (Colors by Will Valle)


Original Back Cover Piece & Gold Metallic Print


Want it all + the ONLY piece of original art!?! Get the only single quantity tier with the 'Burrito Bowl Salad Perk'. It offers every single offered tier throughout the entire campaign, as well as the Prestige Format Back Cover B&W Illustration (signed). And shipping is FREE if domestic!

Items included:
1x Cover A Holofoil
1x Cover B Holofoil
1x Cover C Holofoil
1x Cover D Holofoil
1x Narwhal Cover
1x Snogan Cover
1x Snogan Cover Virgin
1x Sticker Book Ashcan (w 4x sheets of stickers)
4x Over Sized Glitter Stickers (D. Goats/Fraga/Shane/Hail Salad Logo)
14x Standees (Every Character Offered)
1x Character Shirt
1x Rocker Shirt
2x Enamel Pins
1x Lunch Box
1x Pearl Print
1x Gold Print
1x Head Sketch
1x Original 11x17 Back Cover Illustration (Exclusive to this tier)

NEW "BOOTY-FULL" Oversized Glitter Sticker COMING SOON!






4-Horseman Cover D Available NOW for a limited time!


Cover A


Cover B (Holofoil)


[SOLD OUT!]  1x Shirt (New Design) & Issue #1 (Narwhal Cover Variant) 


(LIMITED EDITION July 9th & 10th ONLY!) Cover C GoldFoil Upgrade!

Here's the Loot!

  • Multiple Covers w/wo Holofoil Covers.
  • StickerBook Ashcan (16 Pages) with 27 unique Holofoil stickers. (4 Sheets)
  • 8.5x11 Pearl-Metallic "Napoleon" Print
  • T-Shirt with the entire crew.
  • 7 Unique High Quality Plastic 3"x4" Standee toys.

​Series 1 Includes 7 Plastic Standee Figures. 

​Series 2 Includes 7 Plastic Standee Figures. 

"Egg-Salad Perk" Exclusive Lunch box w/ reversible Standee backdrop!


FINAL PROOF Character T-Shirt (Multiple Sizes)


FINAL PROOFS: Holofoil Sticker Sheet (4 Total) & Sticker Book Ashcan (16 Pages)





8.5x11 Pearl-Metallic "Napoleon" Print ($10k Stretch Goal)

 

Stretch Goals!

It wouldn't be an IGG campaign without some super dope stretch goals! Stretch goals 1-4 will be awarded to every patron. If you back at the lowest or highest amount, you will receive whatever loot is unlocked, no matter what!
(*Exception: Goal 2 will only be awarded to those set up to receive the Ashcan)

​Goal 1) $10,000: 8.5 x 11 Pearl-Metallic "Napoleon" Print. [UNLOCKED!]

Goal 2) $25,000: 4th Sticker Sheet for those receiving the Ashcan. [UNLOCKED!]

Goal 3) 500 Backers: Caeser Logo Enamel Pin. [UNLOCKED!]

Goal 4) ​$40,000: "Sparkle EVS Standee" unlocks for only $10 each! [UNLOCKED!]

Goal 5) 600 Backers: Cover A (NewsStand) becomes Holofoil! [UNLOCKED!]

Goal 6) $50,000: 8 more pages of colored interior art! [UNLOCKED!]

Goal 7) 700 Backers: Cover C is upgraded to GoldFoil! [UNLOCKED!]

SECRET Goal 8) FREE Sunglasses for the 'Egg-Salad' Perk! [UNLOCKED!]

story:
Welcome to the TITAN MOUSE 2 - How The Mighty Have Fallen Indiegogo campaign.

My name is Gary Shipman and I'm the creator of Pakkins' Land and Titan - Mouse of Might. At a young age I fell in love with the comic book form and I am happy to be able to tell and share these epic stories with you. How The Mighty Have Fallen is the second book in the Titan Mouse series. 

THE STORY: 

TITAN is an extraordinary creature that has been endowed with powers beyond that of any normal mouse. Titan is originally from another world where the animals are intelligent (see the Pakkins’ Land Omnibus). After triggering an explosion in his world Titan is transported to the world of man where his epic story unfolds. 

TITAN MOUSE 2 "How The Mighty Have Fallen" is the sequel to TITAN - Mouse of Might. The sequel will be at least 68 pages long In stunningly detailed black and white!

Art and story by me, Gary Shipman.

 

Join the process on my YouTube channel where I work on pages. https://www.youtube.com/user/MrGship. 

As the campaign grows stretch goals will provide ALL book BACKERS with New DAZZLING TRADING CARDS, BOOKMARKS, STICKERS, and more!

Fan Art Contest!

Get you art in to the TITAN 2 Fan Art Contest! The winner art will be printed in the TITAN 2 Deluxe Edition and their art will be used in the deluxe perk sticker, bookmark, or trading card (winners choice).

TITAN wants you! Get your pencils and paper out! Warm up your drawing tablets! It's draw'n time!

Here's how it works:

You draw the best TITAN - Mouse comic drawing you can. (keep it clean. There are kids watching). Make TITAN proud!

Then submit your work of art by posting it on social media with hashtag #TitanMouseFanArt.

Congratulation goes out to Melissa Laster winner of the Titan Mouse 2 Fan Art contest.

Melissa's piece was selected on a live stream on MrGship YouTube channel. All book backers will be receiving Melissa's trading card.

Get the word out!

 

STRETCH GOALS:

$4K!  UNLOCKED! Now all Early Bird Special perk backers get the first TITAN Mouse, 4x4" static cling vinyl decal!

$5K!  UNLOCKED! EVERY Physical Book Backer gets the new Titan trading card #3! 
$6K!  UNLOCKED! EVERY Physical Book Backer gets the new Titan bookmark! 
$7K!  UNLOCKED! EVERY Physical Book Backer gets the new Titan trading card #4 
$8K!  UNLOCKED! EVERY Physical Book Backer gets the new Titan sticker! 

$10K!  UNLOCKED! Every Physical Book Backer gets the new Titan patch!

$11K!   UNLOCKED! the TITAN Fan Art Contest! The winner will be printed in the Deluxe Edition and their art will be used in the deluxe perk sticker, bookmark, or trading card. 
$12K!   UNLOCKED! Every Physical Book Backer gets the new Titan #4 postcard!

$14K!   UNLOCKED! Every Physical Book Backer gets the new Titan #5 postcard!

$14.5K!   UNLOCKED! Every Physical Book Backer gets the new Titan #6 postcard!

$15K!  UNLOCKED! One lucky Backer will win a 3D Titan Mouse of Might hand painted sculpture.
 

$500K!  LOCKED! TITAN - Mouse of Might Animated Show!

Sneak Peak

A closer look inside TITAN 2 - How The Mighty Have Fallen
These pages show the working in progress and are not the necessarily the finished product.

story:
Chaotic Flux centers on a group of unique heroes who unite in the future to rid the world of Dreadfiends, flesh-devouring mutant abominations. These heroes form a group called the Crimson Flame and become humanity's last hope of survival.

Chaotic Flux #3 is 30 pages long.

Chaotic Flux #2 left Zithara, a powerful hybrid alien warrior, surprised by a Dreadfiend's extreme mutating ability. This reborn monster won't stop at anything until it gets its revenge on her by ripping her apart just and devouring her rare hybrid flesh.

As she is fighting to survive this new horror the twisted cyborg Lt. Vladic is waiting for his chance to finally bring her to his master, Thraxus Prime.  Lt. Vladic will unknowingly kick off a series of events that will begin Zithara on a new path of daring heroics, with an exo-suit pilot named Sorin and an highly advanced A.I. war machine named Strife. Together they will start the super team, The Crimson Flame.

You can get Chaotic Flux #1 and #2 as an add-ons at checkout.

In both physical and PDF formats.

All books come shipped bagged & boarded.

Shipped in cardboard.

All 3 books equal out to 84 pages of intense

Sci-Fi action and suspense!

 

Chaotic Flux #1 is 26 pages long.

DOUBLE SPLASH PAGE

 

Chaotic Flux #2 is 28 pages long.

Go to SharpEdgeComics.com to see lots more on

Chaotic Flux #1 & 2,

including more preview pages.

 

Main characters in issues 1-3

Hello. My name is Scott Payne. I have been a huge comic book fanatic for most of my life and I've wanted to be a comic book creator ever since I can remember. I've always felt that if I'm going to do it, I'm going to do it BIG.

I have been building on this story and world for about 20 years. Chaotic Flux is a grand culmination of ideas, story elements, and characters influenced by many things that I have loved throughout my life. It is a passion of mine and I want nothing more than to get it into the hands of readers.

Illustrator: Brian Balondo - Returning for Chaotic Flux #3, Brian is a very talented and versatile up and comic book coming artist. It has been said many times that his art would fit wonderfully in the books of the big 2. Some of his other works include Star Burn, Rising Sun, Undercity Tales, and Chaotic Flux #1 and 2.

Colorist: Bryan Magnaye - Returning for Chaotic Flux #3, Bryan is a genius when it comes to his coloring techniques. He makes that art just jump right off of the page every time. Some of Bryan's other works include The Mighty Titans, War of the Independents, Rising Sun, Undercity Tales, and the greatly successful IndieGoGo comic, RAVAGE - KILL ALL MEN!

Letterer: Janelle Murphy - Returning as letterer for the second time, following Chaotic Flux #2. As you can see from the previews above, she has a natural talent for it. Her drive and devotion to making this book turn out great continues to be just as strong as anyone else's on our team.

I am so lucky to have these amazing and talented artists to help me bring my vision to life.

ADDITIONAL PERKS

 

Chaotic Flux character sketch cards

by Simon SIM Pothier

These are HAND DRAWN AND INKED ORIGINAL ART sketch card pieces of Lt. Vladic and Zithara, by the talented Simon SIM Pothier! ONLY ONE OF EACH was made. So these are SUPER RARE. They are going for $25 each, with NO SHIPPING COST!

Simon SIM Pothier is known for his Heavy Metal Magazine art style and is a talented comic book creator.  His works include, BLOODHUNT: Payback is a Bitch! and Tales from the NATVERSE now InDemand here on IndieGoGo. Which you can find HERE!

Get these FANTASTIC original sketch cards while you can!

 

THE FOLLOWING ITEMS ARE

NO LONGER AVAILABLE

(Option available in select packages)

(SHIPS WORLDWIDE IN SELECT PERK PACKAGES)

STRETCH GOALS

Trading card art design

 

 

 

The 6 members of the

Crimson Flame:

Sorin (team leader) - Pilot of the Reaper exosuit

Zithara - Alien human hybrid warrior

Strife - Transforming, self engineering A.I. mecha

Nellaria - Fire-based mage

Pagan - Plant-based mage

Garadith - 8' tall swordsman, with a giant transforming double bladed sword.

 

What We Need &

What You Get

We are asking for $4000. However, $6,000 is needed to cover the full cost of the new book.

$4,000 mainly covers the cost of paying the talented illustrator of Chaotic Flux #3 and printing 1250 copies of the non-metallic version of the book as well as making all of these additional awesome rewards, and shipping them all out to you.

You get a fantastic, professional quality, dark Sci-fi adventure.

Any money raised beyond the $6,000 mark goes towards the creation of Chaotic Flux #4.

 

Risks & Challenges

None. The book will be finished and shipped to you, regardless of hitting the campaign goal.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. It would be so greatly appreciated.

Remember, IndieGoGo has a sharing tool just for that.

Please share anywhere and everywhere you can. Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and any place else you can think of.

Every little bit goes a long way! Thank you for your support.
story_txt:
Chaotic Flux centers on a group of unique heroes who unite in the future to rid the world of Dreadfiends, flesh-devouring mutant abominations. These heroes form a group called the Crimson Flame and become humanity's last hope of survival.
Chaotic Flux #3 is 30 pages long.
Chaotic Flux #2 left Zithara, a powerful hybrid alien warrior, surprised by a Dreadfiend's extreme mutating ability. This reborn monster won't stop at anything until it gets its revenge on her by ripping her apart just and devouring her rare hybrid flesh.
As she is fighting to survive this new horror the twisted cyborg Lt. Vladic is waiting for his chance to finally bring her to his master, Thraxus Prime.  Lt. Vladic will unknowingly kick off a series of events that will begin Zithara on a new path of daring heroics, with an exo-suit pilot named Sorin and an highly advanced A.I. war machine named Strife. Together they will start the super team, The Crimson Flame.




You can get Chaotic Flux #1 and #2 as an add-ons at checkout.
In both physical and PDF formats.
All books come shipped bagged & boarded.
Shipped in cardboard.

All 3 books equal out to 84 pages of intense
Sci-Fi action and suspense!
 
Chaotic Flux #1 is 26 pages long.



DOUBLE SPLASH PAGE


 
Chaotic Flux #2 is 28 pages long.




Go to SharpEdgeComics.com to see lots more on 

Chaotic Flux #1 & 2, 

including more preview pages.
 
Main characters in issues 1-3


Hello. My name is Scott Payne. I have been a huge comic book fanatic for most of my life and I've wanted to be a comic book creator ever since I can remember. I've always felt that if I'm going to do it, I'm going to do it BIG.
I have been building on this story and world for about 20 years. Chaotic Flux is a grand culmination of ideas, story elements, and characters influenced by many things that I have loved throughout my life. It is a passion of mine and I want nothing more than to get it into the hands of readers.

Illustrator: Brian Balondo - Returning for Chaotic Flux #3, Brian is a very talented and versatile up and comic book coming artist. It has been said many times that his art would fit wonderfully in the books of the big 2. Some of his other works include Star Burn, Rising Sun, Undercity Tales, and Chaotic Flux #1 and 2.
Colorist: Bryan Magnaye - Returning for Chaotic Flux #3, Bryan is a genius when it comes to his coloring techniques. He makes that art just jump right off of the page every time. Some of Bryan's other works include The Mighty Titans, War of the Independents, Rising Sun, Undercity Tales, and the greatly successful IndieGoGo comic, RAVAGE - KILL ALL MEN!
Letterer: Janelle Murphy - Returning as letterer for the second time, following Chaotic Flux #2. As you can see from the previews above, she has a natural talent for it. Her drive and devotion to making this book turn out great continues to be just as strong as anyone else's on our team.
I am so lucky to have these amazing and talented artists to help me bring my vision to life.

ADDITIONAL PERKS
 
Chaotic Flux character sketch cards
by Simon SIM Pothier

These are HAND DRAWN AND INKED ORIGINAL ART sketch card pieces of Lt. Vladic and Zithara, by the talented Simon SIM Pothier! ONLY ONE OF EACH was made. So these are SUPER RARE. They are going for $25 each, with NO SHIPPING COST!
Simon SIM Pothier is known for his Heavy Metal Magazine art style and is a talented comic book creator.  His works include, BLOODHUNT: Payback is a Bitch! and Tales from the NATVERSE now InDemand here on IndieGoGo. Which you can find HERE!
Get these FANTASTIC original sketch cards while you can!

story:
COMMI3 MARK LEADS GLORIOUS COMIC BOOK REVOLUTION REWRITING THE HISTORY OF THE GOLDEN AGE

"SЭIZЭ THЭ MЭAИS OF COMIC PЯODUCTIOИ" - COMMIЭ MAЯK

 

IN 1956 THE ONE TIME LARGEST COMIC BOOK COMPANY IN THE UNITED STATES CLOSED ITS DOORS FOR THE LAST TIME. An  anti communist cancel culture conspiracy involving Senator McCarthy, a crackpot German scientist, the F.B.I, and a coalition of hysterical housewives and righteous religious types saw the establishment of the Comics Code Authority that bought down the curtain on a company that once boasted over SIX MILLION READERS.

When the company shut down the characters it published fell into the PUBLIC DOMAIN as some of the best selling titles of the age were lost: Daredevil, Silver Streak, Captain Battle, Crime Does Not Pay and many more...

With your help we can roll our Soviet era tanks down Main Street, kick down the old doors of the abandoned LEV GLEASON PUBLICATIONS, dust off the old printing presses and REDISTRIBUTE these classic GOLDEN AGE comic book characters from the PUBLIC DOMAIN to a more modern audience. Together we can SEIZE THE MEANS OF COMIC PRODUCTION and take on the COMIC INDUSTRIAL COMPLEX.

After successfully fulfilling the hilarious "KIM IL SUNG AND BEST KOREA" the Controversial Western comic book writer and satirist Commi3 Mark returns with the long anticipated and soon to be hit series NOT DAREDEVIL

 

BANNED COVER BY JAMES MILNE (DOOMSDAY KINGDOM)

 

NOT DAREDEVIL VS THE KLU KLUX KLAN is a 30+ page satirical parody of the culture and context of the Golden Age of Comics.

With gorgeous original art work by EISNER HALL OF FAME member CHARLES BIRO and DON RICO (creator of Black Widow) the hero formerly known as DAREDEVIL returns in HILARIOUS fashion as he uncovers a secret plot between the KKK and the mysterious SCARLET SKULL to over throw the United States government using cutting edge GENDER and RACE SWAPPING technology. 

Extensive research has shown that the easiest way for LEFT WING comic book writers to break into the industry is by doing yet another REBOOT of a beloved pre-existing character and fill the book with heavy handed COMMUNIST PROPAGANDA and divisive CRITICAL RACE issues.

NOT DAREDEVIL VS THE KLAN not only mocks  the outdated CULTURAL BELIEFS of the original 1930s GOLDEN AGE creators but also the tired tropes and lazy writing in MODERN COMICS awful attempts at rebooting CLASSIC franchises. With in-between articles, fake satirical advertisements and letters to the editor NOT DAREDEVIL VS THE KKK captures the style and spirit of GOLDEN AGE COMICS

 

 

VARIANT COVERS FOR VS THE KKK

 

With ALL the VARIANT COVERS already in out HANDS, at COMMI3 MARK HQ, a LIMITED number of the VARIANTS will be available. 

 

NOT SAVAGE DRAGON 

Inspired by the inclusion of GOLDEN AGE DAREDEVIL (among others) into the SAVAGE DRAGON universe… The gorgeous JASON CRAGER (Hammer, The Kill Journal, some thing with Warren Ellis?) and INKSPOTS (Cash Grab, Charlie's London) cover offers a homage to ERIK LARSENs SAVAGE DRAGON number 58. 

 

NOT VAMPIRELLA

The cover affectionately referred to as the NOT VAMPIRELLA variant in the offices at COMMI3 MARK HQ sees our hero NOT DAREDEVIL rocking the classic leotard and big collar look of DYNAMITEs most iconic character. 


 

NOT DAREDEVIL ORIGINS

Discover the mysterious beginnings of NOT DAREDEVIL and learn the history behind LEV GLEASON's marquee GOLDEN AGE character in this comedic retelling of his classic ORIGIN story in the very originally titled NOT DAREDEVIL ORIGINS.

story:
PLEASE NOTE: We will be fulfilling the rewards from both the US and Australia in order to lower shipping costs for the backers. The pledge levels are all in Australian dollars but Indiegogo will convert it to your local currency.

 

 

Exilium is a sci-fi action series taking place in the late 21st century that is returning for its second season following a highly successful six-issue first season (which, if you missed it, is available as part of this campaign), as well as a new spin-off series, Exilium: Vanguard.

 

The first series saw the first official contact having been made with an advanced, extraterrestrial race. On the run from a superior force, they sought refuge on Earth, deeply dividing humanity.

Unknowingly leading their oppressors to Earth, the aliens along with the human faction they had allied themselves with struggled to mount an effective defence.

Humanity's only hope rested with a mysterious group known as the Exilium, where a shocking truth awaited, leaving the heroic trio of Nia, Tr'u and Ken, and indeed all of Earth in absolutely dire straits.

 

 

The second series continues right where we left off in season one and is sure to be another wild ride as the trio of Nia, Tr'u and Ken are called upon in aid of the very foe they had spent most of their lives fighting against.

 

 

Hi! I'm Ben Slabak, the writer and creator of EXILIUM. I've been writing and producing comics since 2014 and EXILIUM is one of my favourite stories I have written, borne out of love for sci-fi and space opera classics such as Star Trek, Battlestar Galactica, Stargate, Firefly, and others.

 

I've come back to Indiegogo to help fund:

      • EXILIUM Season 2 Issue #2

      • EXILIUM: VANGUARD Issues #1-2

 

 

 

 

* Final page count to be confirmed.

 

And if you missed our 2020 Kickstarter for the first issue of Exilium Season 2, it is also available as part of this campaign!

 

 

Exilium: Vanguard is a spin-off that I'm very excited about.

It expands the Exilium universe and introduces new characters and a new story arc, which opens just before the events taking place in the first issue of the first series of Exilium. There will be some familiar faces in the first issue of Exilium: Vanguard, too, for our returning readers. Masterfully illustrated by the talented Pablo Verdugo Muñoz, we've opted for a different look for this series by presenting it in grey tones, and I think you'll find the end result simply marvellous.

 

 

“Slabak and Verdugo Munoz deliver a solid big budget sci-fi action epic in a way that is fun, relatable, and pulls you in from the very start. Crisp writing and stunning visuals make  Exilium Vanguard a must have for lovers of the genre.” - Jimmy Palmiotti (Harley Quinn, Painkiller Jane)

 

“Exilium hits all the right notes of a sci-fi story to keep true fans of the genre head-banging the entire time.” - Jonathan Hedrick (The Recount, Freakshow)

 

"Every book I've seen from Ben Slabak has taken my breath away... if only my own comics looked that good!" - Darren Close (Killeroo)

 

"A thoughtful love letter to the great space operas that wrestles with big hairy social, political, and existential questions in a really meaningful way. New season. New threat. It’s a perfect time to hop aboard." - Rylend Grant (Suicide Jockeys, Banjax, Aberrant)

 

“Exilium continues to find its own voice while singing love songs of sci-fi of the past." - Lan Pitts (WWE, Big Hype)

 

 

Exilium: Vanguard #1

 

Exilium Season 2 Issue #2

story:
Hello! My name is Matt Trinh, many will know me from the Mythoverse Comics Kickstarters the joint Mythoverse campaign, and Mythics Issue Two. Both Kickstarters were successful, and we're continuing to put out new comics with a now completely fulfilled third Kickstarter Hallowed Harvest and the recent funding of Adobe Kroger Issue 2!

With credentials out of the way, I'm working with artist Trevis Martinez to finally bring to life a space opera story I've been developing since 2013, MacKinnon Chronicles. I've been tweaking the story, with two major revisions along the several years of development.

The year is 2493 of the Solarian Era.

Humanity has reached the farthest ends of the galaxy. Two interstellar nations reign supreme over humanity's colonies, the Solarian Alliance and the Terran Federal Republic. The two powers have been in a centuries long cold war that's been kept in check by the brutal reminder of the Decade War waged by the Alliance to "reintegrate" the smaller Republic. Both sides suffered massive losses compounded by the scorched earth policy of the Republic, with both sides agreeing to a peace treaty that recognized the Terran Federal Republic as a sovereign nation.

A thousand years later, the ongoing cold war threatens to turn hot once more.

Maisie MacKinnon is a captain in the Solarian Alliance AstroForce commanding the battlecruiser Hyperion in the Avalon system. The Solarians were given information on a stolen Terran heavy cruiser operating as a pirate ship, and Captain MacKinnon is ordered to stop the pirate ship by any means necessary.

Designs by Killbox

 

 

As a crowdfunding campaign, variety in rewards is the key to success.

Along with the standard cover, there is the Micro Gravity Pool offered as both SFW, and NSFW.

 

 

The Killbox variant is colored by Dylan Fagan, another creator from the Mythoverse, and both were among the first to make fanart for the series.

Colored Version will be up soon.

The Creators Guide is a guidebook for those who want to make their own stories in the universe. It's a concept that I put in place once I realized how truly massive this universe is. It'll have character information, a brief history of both star nations, and how to build a convincing fleet in the universe with the strategic doctrine of both nations. Also included is information on alien relics found across the galaxy, and the TechnoWizards, a secretive order of space wizards that use advanced technology to simulate magic.

Printed through Comix Wellspring!
