story:
Overview

Doc Salem is a 52 page full color Graphic Novel that re-imagines the world of Mary Shelly’s Frankenstein.

Dr. Victor Frankenstein endures the life threatening wounds inflicted by his very own creation. Igor injects him with the elixir of life, which puts him in a state of suspended animation. When he finally awakes many years have passed and times have changed. The world that he knew is long gone and the tables have turned. Monsters have emerged from the shadows and taken over the underworld. Meanwhile, Dr. Victor Frankenstein is a wanted man for his crimes against humanity due to his creation. Victor assumes the guise of Doc Salem to make amends for his transgressions and hunts down rouge monsters that bring death, destruction and turmoil to the world around them.

Not only do you get the origin of doc Salem but Doc Salem #1 also kicks off the first ever comicsgate crossover. Doc Salem joins Six Gun Gorilla and Doc Alpha in and epic adventure to save or ....ummm ....damn the world!

This new exciting tail is inspired by Mary Shelly’s Frankenstein and the Golden Age

of Comics.

 

 

Created by Preston Asevedo a co-creator of Rockabilly Road Trip, a Valiant Comics cover artist and artist on Antarctic Press’ golden age revival titles (Jungle & Planet comics). Brings you a fresh new look inside the world of Classic Monsters & Lovecraftian mayhem.

 

New Perk!

 

 

STRETCH GOAL CROSS OVER COVER IS AVAILABLE!

 

 

 

 

The Crossover!

 

Original art Perks:

 

 

Stretch Goals:

$10,000 = Collectors Ashcan

$20,000= To be Announced

story:
QUANTUM  VIBE, a story of humanity's future inter-galactic diaspora, was launched on the Web in 2011 and we're ready to print and distribute our seventh volume, QUANTUM VIBE: This Means War Part 1.  In this volume, the sprawling space-city known as Bubbleopolis suffers a devastating attack from an unknown quarter, and it's up to our heroes to find out who is making war and put a stop to them.

The story is completed. All that's left is to produce print- and e-book editions.

Printing and shipping physical books is expensive, but advertising on our web page doesn't begin to cover the bills, so we must print and we must ship (no, not that kind of "ship.") And that costs money up front, and that's why we've turned to Indiegogo for funding.

Our plan is to get the books offset-printed by Mixam, a North American printer with a good track record and very competitive pricing. The books will be 7.44" x 9.25" in trim size, and 104 total pages including 96 story pages plus end pages and some other matter. Our minimum goal is to raise $7,000 to print a short run of trade paperbacks and postcards for our backers here, and have enough left over for dinner. But there's more we'd like to do if we can exceed that minimum target.

If response is good enough we plan to add more goodies: stickers, posters, cloissone pins, a hard-cover edition, variant covers. And anyone ordering at the highest-tier levels can get their own one-of-a-kind, hand-drawn (or painted) rendering of their favorite QUANTUM VIBE character(s)!

If we don't reach our goal we will use a print-on-demand printer to produce however many trade paperback copies and postcards get ordered, and mail them out.

Who we are

We are the Brothers Bieser: Scott (cartoonist) and Frank (website/business manager and bon vivant), a pair of crazy Texans who've been producing web-comics under the Big Head Press banner since 2003, beginning with _A Drug War Carol_ (with Susan W. Wells) and the Prometheus award winning _The Probability Broach: The Graphic Novel (with L. Neil Smith).

We're also part of the Free Cosmos Project. (More about that later.)

The Impact

The success of this campaign will weigh greatly on whether the QUANTUM VIBE series will continue. Scott's getting old and is tired of surviving on oatmeal and peanut-butter sandwiches. If this doesn't pan out he'll have to give up his life-long dream of cartooning for a living, and go back to working at call-centers.

Risks & Challenges

The art is done. We've published several books already but this will be the first using this printer. While Mixam comes highly recommended, when working with a printer for the first time, there can be some hiccups, but nothing that should cause more than a few weeks' delay.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know times are challenging for many of us and you might want to contribute but can't swing $25 for a book. That's why we have the lowest perk levels, so you can get some postcards and still be part of the Free Cosmos Project (more about that later).

And if you can't spend anything right now, we understand. Enjoy the story for free on-line, and please share links to this Idiegogo campaign with your friends.

Stretch Goals

After we meet our first goal we have the following stretch goals in mind:
$10,000: The Official Poster for this campaign (work in progress shown below) gets printed in full 18" x 20" glory and shipped in a tube (so no creases!). 


 

$20,000: Hard-back upgrade! A deluxe, "hard-back" edition (with slipcover) becomes an available perk.  We'll also throw in some QUANTUM VIBE themed stickers with every physical product (except the single postcards) sent out.

story:
What's Oddity About?

Deep in the heart of a strange bayou lives the Oddity. He emerges from his secret lair only when his watery home is in danger from outsiders. Or when he has to make a run to the bait shop to pick up groceries. Frankly, getting him off his couch is kind of a challenge most of the time.

Lazy and careless, Oddity is given strange powers and chosen by the spirit of the swamp to act as it's guardian and caretaker. It's a role he accepts reluctantly, and performs thoughtlessly. This dereliction of duty causes him to accidentally unleash monsters on the swamp and the local town. With the help of his mentor, a giant Housefly named Errow, and a local grad student with a dark past, Oddity must learn to embrace his powers and responsibilities and become the hero he never wanted to be.

Oddity is beautifully drawn by Sweens, written by David Shawn with letters by Eric Weathers. All of us are excited to bring you a comic full of action, horror, and a liberal dose of humor! We want to make you laugh out loud. No agendas, no politics, just a fun story with crazy characters. Help us reach our $3000 goal and get this book printed and shipped to your door! 

Read the first 12 pages of Oddity here:

 

Sweens/Ethan Van Sciver jam cover, colored by Kyle Ritter!

As of May 1st this option is no longer available.

 

As of May 1st all stretch goals are unavailable to new backers. This is so print files can be prepared and ordered in time for fulfillment.

$8K STRETCH GOAL     UNLOCKED!

Not one, but two amazing pin ups!

One is drawn by none other than Matt Houston! The other created by the talented Donal DeLay, colors by Sweens! Everyone needs a little #TeamMonster mashup!

8K Stretch Goal, Pin up by Matt Houston

$10K STRETCH GOAL     UNLOCKED!

Oddity gets himself into a slight predicament in Paige’s pin up! Do you see what he’s doing wrong? Me neither. Drawn by the amazing Sashi!

$12K STRETCH GOAL 

We all collected them as kids! Some of us still collect them as adults! When we hit $12K, every backer of a physical copy will get some Oddity trading cards! No slacking we've got some great designs coming up! All backers will get a randomized assortment, so you'll want to display them proudly!

$15K STRETCH GOAL 

Oddity Glow In The Dark Enamel pins!

 

$20K STRETCH GOAL

Be a part of the ODD ARMY with this exclusive 2.5 inch by 3.5 inch ODD ARMY patch! Show the world that you supported a weird indie comic about swamp shenanigans!

story:
Turn stress into fun with THE ECO PUNKS! Over 30 pages of comics and art!

 

The goal is to make getting into the environment fun, instead of a stress-fest. This high quality book is designed to be interactive, and is made from materials not harmful to the environment. Currently we're FINALIZING the book, everything is almost ready to be shipped out!

The goal of the crowdfunding is to get THE ECO-PUNKS into your hands as soon as possible, because raising awareness on these topics is extremely urgent.

We're getting these into homes before Christmas.

*Usually most other comics take 6-12 months to ship out, but we're going to do it in three.

Most other comic books on this platform start at 25. Ours start at 10. These topics need to be more accessible.

Shipping is free for US on everything 25 and above.

(The Digital Deluxe is international.)

All physical tiers will add your name in the book along with the other backers, to show you supported an eco-friendly project!

The book spans multiple genres including action, mystery, and adventure!

[I think this is one of those potential...not just dynamic but societal pushes forward that could be left for the next generation or influencing the next generation.]

-Jake Martin, Origin Sagas Podcast

 

The book is being created through GreenerPrinter, as they have decades of experience in sustainable printing.

We've also been in support by climate scientist Francis Tarasiewcz! We're trying to keep it both fun and correct. You can hear his bit in the trailer at 1:13!

 

Most books are designed to be read once and never again, and we're designing this book to be read many times over, so you get the most out of it!

 

HERE'S SOME OF WHAT YOU'LL BE GETTING!

DRIVER COVER, PUZZLE COVER, AND THE PLANT GIRL COVER.

Below is  PLENTY OF FISH  by GILLIAN ABRAMS and TAISEI NOGUCHI!

 

Excerpt from EEMAPSO. She'll be doing an adventure-mystery story. (Completed)

Excerpt from BEACH DAY by CARL MORGANS AND GILLIAN ABRAMS. (Completed)

Illustration by NOAH POIRIER.

 

Below is The Librarian: a woman with no books on a quest to become...an actual librarian. Her story will be filled with interactive and fun content, including puzzles!

Progress on one of the pages by Intsui!

 

CREATORS:

 

WRITERS: Gillian Abrams (LA SCREENPLAY AWARD WINNER) Also happens to be dyslexic!

 

(COMIC) ARTISTS:

Includes dozens of topics about the environment with their own fun spin! Plants, Driving and Animals to name a few! Most of these people graduated with comic or illustration degrees!

Charcooll: (Proficient Character Designer)

EEMapso (Known for RAMPID! on webtoons)

Kyreono (Known for 206° on webtoons) 

Alex Shammas (Known for ROTTE on webtoons) 

Melodie Lapot (Known for HERE IN THE WEST on tapas) 

Carl Morgans, Karolyn Zheng, Tani Andrews, Intsui, Lepidoptera, Noah Poirier

Joey Roditis, Tomas Vallecillo, Jessica Durant, Taisei Noguchi, KuroVibes, Adam Kohn, 

 

LETTERING/TYPOGRAPHY: Intsui

Doing the librarian story and typography! Classic, Graffiti, and Calligraphy Styles!

 

MUSICIANS: Ishmael Antoine, Jomar, Wyl Harrison, The Arttemis Collective

Music from pro musicians doing genres including trap, rock, and house! The goal is to feel like you're traveling to the different biomes of the world!

 

 

About us.

  • How We Can Help was made almost a year ago with the intent to make learning about the environment fun. No-one else wanted to so we did it ourselves. So far we've done an illustrated poetry book, and an environmental word search. Our current project, with your help, will push all of this to the next level.

 

We need to cover production costs for the books, the contributors, and the shipping of the anthology!

 

STRETCH GOALS (Extra things for when we make it past 10k!)

$11K: MORE VARIANT COVERS FROM BIG ARTISTS!

$20K: FULL COLOR! (As of now it's partial color; colorists are really expensive!)

$30K: 3X GREEN INTERACTIVE WEBSITE FOR OUR COMICS! (Sites aren't normally eco-friendly, so we'll use GreenGeeks for hosting!)

$40K: US-Wide Distribution to comic shops!

$50K: AUDIOBOOK! (Fully voice acted and casted!)

 

By helping us use silk and recycled materials for the book, you're proving that change can be sleek and simple. 

 

Should the project get a lot of traction, We'll need help with all the shipping and production of those books! A third of the money will cover artists, and another will cover shipping/production. The rest should cover all the fees, while leaving some wiggle room.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If contributing isn't a possibility, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! Sharing links to the project really helps!
  • TRY TO SHOW THE LINK TO AT LEAST TWO OTHER PEOPLE!

We hope you get THE ECO-PUNKS, and help take us part in creating some good in the world!

story:
Batman artist Graham Nolan once again teams up with Ominous Press, bringing you a story 20 years in the making! Ominous Press is very proud to present classic adventure tale of two Navy pilots arriving on a lost island populated by giant monsters and strange aliens: Graham Nolan's Return to Monster Island!

Two years have passed since our heroes, Mac and Duke escaped from their adventure on Monster Island. Now the island has once more appeared on earth, this time OVER the Bering Sea, and our stalwart pilots are once more called to service!

An alien group has taken over the island from the Gooch and Mac and Duke, with the aid of two Russian flyers have to set things right. Can they do it before the island phases out again?

Find out when you read the long awaited sequel to Monster Island...RETURN TO MONSTER ISLAND!

Also available is an all new, full color, version of the story that started it all, Graham Nolan's Monster Island. Printed in an oversized hardcover, this bad boy is beautifully colored by Gregory Wright and is printed at the same size as Graham Nolan's Return to Monster Island to make a complete set.

Kelly “Mac” MacGruder is a brave, strong-willed, Radar Intercept Officer. She’s a romantic at heart, and in love with Duke, but won’t let him know that!

Tommy “Duke” Mitchell is a top-gun Navy pilot, and a huge fan of John Wayne. Cool and confident, Duke thinks he’s a real ladies man ... and, in fact, he is!

(Maj.) Vitaliy Ivanoff is a top Russian MiG-31 pilot. Vitaliy is a proud Russian, well educated and ambitious. He desperately wants to acquire Gooch alien technology.

(Cpt.) Sergei Rustam the WSO (Weapon Systems Operator) of the Russian MiG-31. Sergei is not the sharpest tool in the Russian shed but he is loyal to Vitaliy and his country. He will do what must be done for mission fulfillment.

Awol is a former member of the Gooch (the caretakers of Monster Island), and now the rebel leader. He is a creature of great dignity, very polite, with a slow-burning but powerful fuse.

Rooster is a rebel, somewhat lazy, and although he has a very gruff exterior, is a softy at heart.

The monsters on the island rule the surface, air and water in their containment zone. If anybody finds themselves within their domain … well, that’s just too bad for them!

The long awaited sequel, Return to Monster Island and the all new colorized version of Graham Nolan's classic Monster Island are here, and you can get the full story in a few different ways including these gorgeous, oversized, hardcovers!

Return to Monster Island and the all new colorized version of the classic Monster Island

RETURN TO MONSTER ISLAND SINGLE ISSUE VARIANT COVERS!

Own the full set of Return to Monster Island single issue comics! All hand signed by Graham Nolan, the full set features the whole story in a three issue run and boasts the amazing covers of Butch Guice (#1), Lee Weeks (#2), and Jose Luis Garcia-Lopez (#3).  Each cover is strictly limited to just 100 hand-numbered issues, available individually or as a set!

Also available: Artist Graham Nolan defined an entire era of  Batman comics, including co-creating the villain Bane. Now Graham delves into his files to present a hardcover collection of classic images,  private commissions, and personal work, much of it never published before. BLACK BOOK: THE ART OF GRAHAM NOLAN is more than 100 pages of artwork and commentary from a classic comic artist!

 

ORIGINAL ART REWARDS!

 

Graham DOES NOT SELL HIS ORIGINAL ART but now you have an opportunity to get an original from the artist himself!

DETECTIVE COMICS #701, Page 2 and 3 Spread Original Art!

DETECTIVE COMICS #701, Pages 2+3 original art by Graham Nolan!

You can own this beautiful paneled spread from Detective Comics #701 by Graham Nolan! Featuring Nightwing, Robin, Huntress and Batman, this is a spectacular, one of a kind piece of comic art! Admit it; this would look awesome on your wall! At this level you also receive digital and physical copies of the colorized Monster Island as well as digital and physical copies of the all new sequel, Return to Monster Island.

 

HEAD SKETCH REWARD

 

Legendary Batman artist Graham Nolan will create a one-of-a-kind head sketch of one of your favorite characters – just for you. Receive a beautiful, inked head sketch that measures 5 inches by 8 inches that any Nolan fan would be proud to display.

This reward also includes both physical and digital copy of Return to Monster Island.

Graham Nolan Head Sketch examples

 

 *THE PROLOGUE*

 

Two years have passed since the events depicted in MONSTER ISLAND. Now Mac, Duke, monsters galore, and the Gooch are all back! I’m so happy to finally bring the long-awaited sequel to my very patient fans! RETURN TO MONSTER ISLAND picks up where we left off, bringing another fun, wild ride. How does Monster Island return? Glad you asked! Here’s a sneak peek at our next saga. Enjoy!

 - Graham Nolan

story:
WHAT IS THIS?

Hi! My name is Anthony Gambino. I'm a freelance illustrator and full-time graphic designer for Marvel Comics.

I'm really excited to share with you my first ever sketchbook! This past year has blessed me with an abundance of illustration work that I'm very happy to put into this collection! 

BUT! As excited as I am to get this book out into the world, I need YOUR HELP to do it! With your contributions, I'll be able to get the books, along with the rest of the cool perks, printed and into your hands!

 

WHAT'S INSIDE?

Here's a preview to some of the pieces in the book:

 

DYSCRASIA

BLOOD REALM

CREATURE FROM THE BLACK LAGOON

DRACULA

THE MUMMY

FRANKENSTEIN'S MONSTER

THE BRIDE OF FRANKENSTEIN

THE BLACK CAR stickers

ALIENS

WIREHEAD

 

ORIGINAL ART

There will be two tiers that offer original artwork: one will offer an original 2.5" x 3.5" sketch card with a character of your choosing and the other tier will offer one of nine original movie monster pieces from the sketchbook!

Let's take a look at some of the other sweet perks available:

PERKS

The goal here is to raise $2,500 in funding in order to print books, coasters, stickers, 8"x 10" prints, bookmarks, postcards, coffee mugs, tea glasses, shot glasses and whiskey glasses!  

Ink 8" x 10" prints

Color 8" x 10" prints

Coasters / Stickers

Bookmarks

Postcards

Promo Pack

BACKER BONUSES!

MONSTER MOVIE POSTERS (6" x 9") 
40 backers - DRACULA poster unlocked!
45 backers - THE WOLFMAN poster unlocked!
50 backers - FRANKENSTEIN poster unlocked!
55 backers - THE MUMMY poster unlocked!
60 backers - THE BRIDE OF FRANKENSTEIN poster unlocked!

 

ADD-ONS!

BAR FRIGHT drinking set: This set reimagines some of the #INKTOBER2020 pieces as characters for a monster-themed bar called Bar Fright! With this set, you'll get 5 coasters and 5 stickers with limited edition coloring, 5 shot glasses and 5 whiskey glasses, each with my original Bar Fright logo designed just for this campaign! Only 3 available. 1 claimed already!

THE BLACK CAR CAFE coffee set: This set reimagines the Black Car stickers as characters for a cafe called The Black Car Cafe! With this set, you'll get 5 coasters and 5 stickers with limited edition coloring, 5 glass coffee mugs and 5 glass tea mugs, each with my original Black Car Cafe logo designed just for this campaign! Only 3 available!

In addition to these cool sets, you could also add on:

  • Bookmarks (set of 5 for $7 - pictured above)
  • Coasters (set of 5 for $7 - pictured above)
  • Post cards (set of 6 for $7 - pictured above)
  • Stickers (set of 5 for $7 - pictured above)

If you have any questions at all, please feel free to email me at gambinostudio@gmail.com.

THANK YOU ALL!

story:
For the first time ever the acclaimed occult noir graphic novel series, CASEFILE: ARKHAM has come to IndieGoGo! This is your chance get signed copies of the series directly from me, author Josh Finney. Already own the books? I've got your back, friend.

NOTE: Casefile: ARKHAM Vol.1 has now gone into its Second Printing!!! Get your copy today!!

PREVIEWS

CASEFILE: ARKHAM Vol. 1: “Nightmare on the Canvas”

A detective, a dame, and the dreams of a dead god. Detective Hank Flynn is back from the war in the Pacific and is now back on the mean streets of the most cursed city on Earth. And things only get worse when a wealthy uptown socialite hires Flynn to track down an artist by the name of Pickman. What begins as a simple missing persons case leads Flynn down a dark path of flesh eating ghouls, vengeful witches, and the notorious Innsmouth mafia.

 

CASEFILE: ARKHAM Vol. 2: “Her Blood Runs Cold”

When a visit from an old friend sets the stage for murder, P.I. Hank Flynn is pulled into a sordid web of deceit, revenge, and black magick. Even worse, Flynn has both the cops and the mob threatening him, urging him to forget everything and leave town. But a promise to a grieving widow to uncover the truth about her husband s death forces Flynn to be at odds with not only the law and the criminal underworld, but the Elder Gods themselves. Taking place three months after the events in Casefile:ARKHAM Nightmare on the Canvas, this volume can be enjoyed as a follow-up or as a stand alone story.

 

ITEMS

story:
Patchwork Comics Presents: Spells & Superheroes 
A deranged dungeon master has captured 4 of Earth’s bravest heroes…and he wants to play a game!

Spells & Superheroes unite for 11 pages of superhero-fantasy horror! 

Can You survive game night?

Prepare yourself and roll for initiative!

Join our team as they are forced to play the most dangerous game…a game for their lives! In this 11-page superhero fantasy short, the villain Dungeon Master will run a game you will never forget!

Spells & Superheroes is an action-comedy with a fantasy twist, for fans of superheroes and Dungeons & Dragons alike!

This story is inspired from various forms of media, brought together in one hilarious and complete story that will leave you afraid to go to your next game night!



1 of 3 Prints INCLUDED WITH ALL Physical tiers!! Art by Samrat Das, colors by Anthony Gambino.

 

With Spells & Superheroes COMPLETELY penciled and inked, only the colors remain. We have funded this project ourselves. We created this campaign to promote Spells & Superheroes within the indie comics community here on Indiegogo; It’s our way to raise awareness and showcase the remarkable talents at Patchwork Comics!

 

Who is Patchwork Comics?

Patchwork Comics is a small collection of creators banded together to help each other grow and network. Patchwork Comics serves as a network for hard-working and motivated creators seeking to hone their craft and build lasting professional and personal relationships along the way.

https://patchworkcomics.com

We believe the future of the comic book industry rests in the hands of the indie community. For this reason, we have made it our goal to inform and promote this community with factual and easily digestible articles on the campaigns that matter to us. Not just our own, but campaigns from all indie creators. Check out Patchwork News on our website for more information!

https://patchworkcomics.com/patchwork-news

 

Put Simply. Patchwork Comics stands for Great entertainment, period.

 

Cover & Interior art by Jacob Whittingham!

 

What’s a "Fun Shot"?

What’s a Fun Shot? A Fun Shot is our version of a traditional "one shot" comic book! Each Fun Shot mini-comic is a varying genre 10-11 page complete story, intended for you to read and enjoy! 

With the launch of our first Fun Shot, Spells & Superheroes, We are laying the groundwork for both Patchwork Comics and our Fun Shot mini-comics the good, old fashioned way...by delivering a fantastic comic and a great backer experience! 

 

Page 1 of Spells & Superheroes

The 3rd and FINAL print Foxman print! Art by Elliot Rodriguez with Colors by Ichthy5! Included with ALL PHYSICAL tiers!

 

SPELLS & SUPERHEROES BATTLE MAP!

Each physical perk tier will include a 11 x 17 "Z-Fold" map. This double-sided map is in the shape and size of a brochure and can be unfolded and be used as a play mat for a battle scene.

Inside of the Battle Map

 

Outside of the Battle Map

 

Perks? Right this way!

 

3 Inch Patchwork Comics Logo Sticker! 

 

4'' x 4'' Fabric Patch By Frankie B. Washington!

 

$1.00 Medieval Deal- For only ONE dollar, you get this comic in digital format and a thank you on the website!

  • Digital copy of Spells & Superheroes 
  • Entrance into the Thank You Hall of Founders

 

$10.00 Adventurer's Pack- At 10 dollars, the digital copy, the physical book, a Patchwork Comics logo sticker, 2 prints, a 2'x3.5' Spells & Superheroes logo Magnet and a custom playable Battle Map made by our very own Marrk Mulgrave! 

  • Digital Copy of Spells & Superheroes
  • Physical Copy of Spells & Superheroes
  • 3 Inch Round Patchwork Comics “PW” logo sticker 
  •  TWO 8x11 Spells & Superheroes Prints by Samrat Das, colored by Anthony Gambino
  • 11x17 playable Battle Map designed by Marrk Mulgrave
  • 2''x3.5'' Spells & Superhero Logo Magnet

 

$15.00 Don't Go Alone Pack- For just 15 dollars, you get it all! This includes the Adventurer's Pack, plus a Spells & Superheroes patch designed by the incomparable Frankie B. Washington!

  • Digital Copy of Spells & Superheroes 
  • Physical Copy of Spells & Superheroes
  • 3 Inch Round Patchwork Comics “PW” logo sticker
  • TWO 8x11 Spells & Superheroes Prints by Samrat Das, colored by Anthony Gambino
  • 11x17 playable Battle Map designed by Marrk Mulgrave
  • 4x4 Game Master Fabric Patch designed by Frankie B. Washington
  • 2''x3.5'' Spells & Superhero Logo Magnet

 

2'' x 3.5'' Square Spells & Superheroes Logo Magnet!

3 of 3 Prints INCLUDED WITH ALL Physical tiers!!  included with ALL physical tiers!

Art by Samrat Das, Colors by Anthony Gambino

 

ARTIST COMMISSIONS! 

Commission one of our fantastic artists below for an 11x17! These commissions are LIMITED so get one now! BACK EITHER OF THESE TIERS AND RECEIVE THE FULL $15 FEATURED TIER ALONG WITH YOUR COMMISSION PURCHASE!

 

$100.00 Anthony Gambino Art Commission- One 11x17 page commission.

2/3 REMAINING


$100.00 Jacob Whittingham Art Commission- One 11x17(A3) page commission.

1/1 REMAINING

 

STRETCH GOALS!

At these various funding milestones, we will unlock the perks below! The Stretch Goal perks will be included with all physical tiers!

Starting at the $750 mark we will being production on a set of 3 trading cards depicting our heroes and the villainous Game Master locked in the heat of battle! These 3 trading cards, designed by Anthony Gambino,  can be enjoyed by themselves or side by side to form an epic battle scene!

 

$750 Stretch Goal: UNLOCKED!!!

1 of 3 Trading Cards

 

$1000 Stretch Goal: LOCKED

2 of 3 Trading Cards

 

$1250 Stretch Goal: LOCKED

3 of 3 Trading Cards

 

$2500 FINAL STRETCH GOAL!! LOCKED

 Marrk will shave a 1'' patch directly down the middle of his mustache.

OKAY you wild animals! You didn't ask for it but you may end up getting it! If we hit the FINAL stretch goal Marrk Mulgrave(writer) will shave a 1 inch patch directly down the middle of his mustache AND keep the shave job for 1 WEEK. 

This is obviously tongue-in-cheek but if we hit this goal Marrk will commit and go through with the shave.

 

SHIPPING!

We ship all items with Gemini boxes!

We are shipping the physical copy, along with the extra goodies, inside a Gemini mailer to ensure the safe arrival of your orders. We will happily replace any damaged or missing goods.(hopefully, we won't have to!)

 

Additional Information on Spells & Superheroes!

With the pencils and inks done and only the colors left, we are finishing this project ourselves. We created this campaign to share the opportunity to invest in our campaign and us!
 

We understand talk is cheap. The responsibility is on US at Patchwork Comics to deliver a stellar campaign and a fantastic book to the backers in return for buying our book with your hard earned money. We completely understand and are fully prepared to kick ass with this campaign and deliver you a memorable experience and book.
 

We have other goodies for the backers lined up waiting for the time to strike! We look forward to bringing all this and more to you over the coming months!

As comic creators, we take our role as content providers seriously. We won’t leave you hanging on this project. THE BACKERS WILL RECEIVE THEIR ORDERS FIRST, BEFORE ANYONE ELSE, & IN A TIMELY MANNER. 

If you like what you see, be sure to tell your friends and like us on social media! Together, we will make this comic a reality.

Creators!

Here is the fantastic team that brought Spells & Superheroes to life! 

Pencils &  Inks: Jacob Whittingham @Jwhittingham

Colors: Anthony Gambino @Gambinostudios

Letters: Keith Gleason @Recklessgleason

Writer: Marrk Mulgrave @Marrkmulgrave


Additional Help: 

Animated Trailer: Pedro Caicedo @Nguila

Prints: Samrat Das - @dsamrat7

Patch: Frankie B. Washington @Frankiebwash

 

Thank you for your time and backing our book!

Digital Copy of Spells & Superheroes 
Physical Copy of Spells & Superheroes
3 Inch Round Patchwork Comics “PW” logo sticker
TWO 8x11 Spells & Superheroes Prints by Samrat Das, colored by Anthony Gambino
11x17 playable Battle Map designed by Marrk Mulgrave
4x4 Game Master Fabric Patch designed by Frankie B. Washington
2''x3.5'' Spells & Superhero Logo Magnet
 2'' x 3.5'' Square Spells & Superheroes Logo Magnet!3 of 3 Prints INCLUDED WITH ALL Physical tiers!!  included with ALL physical tiers!Art by Samrat Das, Colors by Anthony Gambino ARTIST COMMISSIONS! Commission one of our fantastic artists below for an 11x17! These commissions are LIMITED so get one now! BACK EITHER OF THESE TIERS AND RECEIVE THE FULL $15 FEATURED TIER ALONG WITH YOUR COMMISSION PURCHASE! $100.00 Anthony Gambino Art Commission- One 11x17 page commission.2/3 REMAINING$100.00 Jacob Whittingham Art Commission- One 11x17(A3) page commission.1/1 REMAINING STRETCH GOALS!At these various funding milestones, we will unlock the perks below! The Stretch Goal perks will be included with all physical tiers!Starting at the $750 mark we will being production on a set of 3 trading cards depicting our heroes and the villainous Game Master locked in the heat of battle! These 3 trading cards, designed by Anthony Gambino,  can be enjoyed by themselves or side by side to form an epic battle scene! $750 Stretch Goal: UNLOCKED!!!1 of 3 Trading Cards $1000 Stretch Goal: LOCKED2 of 3 Trading Cards $1250 Stretch Goal: LOCKED3 of 3 Trading Cards $2500 FINAL STRETCH GOAL!! LOCKED Marrk will shave a 1'' patch directly down the middle of his mustache.OKAY you wild animals! You didn't ask for it but you may end up getting it! If we hit the FINAL stretch goal Marrk Mulgrave(writer) will shave a 1 inch patch directly down the middle of his mustache AND keep the shave job for 1 WEEK. This is obviously tongue-in-cheek but if we hit this goal Marrk will commit and go through with the shave. SHIPPING!We ship all items with Gemini boxes!We are shipping the physical copy, along with the extra goodies, inside a Gemini mailer to ensure the safe arrival of your orders. We will happily replace any damaged or missing goods.(hopefully, we won't have to!) Additional Information on Spells & Superheroes!With the pencils and inks done and only the colors left, we are finishing this project ourselves. We created this campaign to share the opportunity to invest in our campaign and us! We understand talk is cheap. The responsibility is on US at Patchwork Comics to deliver a stellar campaign and a fantastic book to the backers in return for buying our book with your hard earned money. We completely understand and are fully prepared to kick ass with this campaign and deliver you a memorable experience and book. We have other goodies for the backers lined up waiting for the time to strike! We look forward to bringing all this and more to you over the coming months!As comic creators, we take our role as content providers seriously. We won’t leave you hanging on this project. THE BACKERS WILL RECEIVE THEIR ORDERS FIRST, BEFORE ANYONE ELSE, & IN A TIMELY MANNER. If you like what you see, be sure to tell your friends and like us on social media! Together, we will make this comic a reality.Creators!Here is the fantastic team that brought Spells & Superheroes to life! Pencils &  Inks: Jacob Whittingham @JwhittinghamColors: Anthony Gambino @GambinostudiosLetters: Keith Gleason @RecklessgleasonWriter: Marrk Mulgrave @MarrkmulgraveAdditional Help: Animated Trailer: Pedro Caicedo @NguilaPrints: Samrat Das - @dsamrat7Patch: Frankie B. Washington @Frankiebwash Thank you for your time and backing our book!

story:
We are thrilled to run this campaign to launch our 48-page graphic novel

SKIPT: SEEDS OF POWER

as part one of an epic five-part saga, and the world's first-ever comic book with NFT content! 

Working tirelessly over the past 16 months, our well-rounded team has poured their hearts into ensuring the highest quality from start to finish. Finally, we can proudly present SKIPT to you! 

Written by Florian Pfeiffer, SKIPT is drawn by the experienced artist Don Mark Noceda (Upperdeck - Marvel) with colors by Bryan Arfel Magnaye.

Together our team has produced all 48 pages including the cover and is eagerly looking forward to sending the book to print. 

SKIPT will also be the first comic book ever to release exclusive NFT content to its backers!

For the first time, 40% of all original pages will be minted into NFTs and sent to the recipients after the campaign is fully backed. At the same time backers will be able to receive an exclusive NFT card set as thank you for the early support of the project.  

SKIPT tells the action-packed story of a group of outcasts that tries to survive at the fringe of society and upsets the fragile power balance in place, making them the hunted. 
In a future, where privatization has reached its peak, everything is owned by a syndicate of five mega-corporations. While trying to make a living and run from past sins, the gang creates a substance that threatens the decades-old power balance. Hunted by the most powerful entities to be, the gang has to find a way not only to survive but to take over! 


Follow the gang of SKIPT on an action-packed journey through a dark world full of intrigues and blurry lines.  


and see them face life-changing challenges on their way to freedom and wealth! 

About me: 

I am Florian Pfeiffer, the writer, creator, and project manager of SKIPT and this campaign. I am a 29-year-old comic book writer and enthusiast from Switzerland. In this field, SKIPT is my first project and I'm eager to prove myself and the skills of my team. We have produced all pages of this book up to and including the lettering stage so that we can ensure fast and efficient fulfillment of the campaign upon its completion. As an art collector and lifelong fan of comic books, both American and European, I poured my soul into finding the best partners for this project. Working with our experienced artists and securing the support of experienced players in the fields of printing and distribution, as well as all NFT preparation, I am now proud to present the story I wanted to tell you all my life!

Join us now on this adventure, but strap in - it is going to be quite a ride I have prepared for you in these pages!

story:
Overview

ROKAN is an exciting, new, ongoing comic book series from co-creators Ben Jackson and Max Headshroom.  The first issue explores the origin story of ROKAN in 30 hand painted, full color pages.

“The society that separates its scholars from its warriors will have its thinking done by cowards and its fighting by fools.”

-Thucydides

                           

                          

                          

                          

                         

                         


 

If we hit $4,000 we will be producing 2 Metalic 2.5"x3.5" Trading Cards featuring two main characters of Abe and Rokan as a stretch goal Unlock this goal to see the cards. 
                                   

                                       

              

     

Thucydides’ words serve as the perfect epigram to communicate the theme and intent behind the story of Rokan. Picture a society based in part on the rivalry between Athens and Sparta but reimagined in perfect collaborative harmony. The Older Brothers devote their time and lives to magical/religious revelations while The Younger Brothers, a corresponding caste of elite warriors and austere manual laborers, protect them and safeguard their discoveries.

                            

In such a world, one man finds himself torn between these two roles. Rejected by both and unwilling to turn his back on either, Rokan must combine his skills as a warrior with his wizardly insight to overcome obstacles in his struggle for survival and conquest.                          
Creative team Ben Jackson and Max Headshroom are combining the titanic fun of comic  book superhero  fights with a mesmerizing fantasy landscape full of creatures, cultures, and mythologies reminiscent of creators such as Simon Bisley and Frank Frazetta     

                                                
From the grittiest Heavy Metal Magazine aficionado to the most diligent  dungeons master, Rokan is sure to please fantasy fans and superhero comic book fanatics alike.

                          Follow Rokan as he discovers and hones his powers, leaving the felled bodies of monsters and enemies in his wake. 

Rokan is part fantasy, part super hero,
and ALL METAL.

story:
EDIT: FUNDED!

WOW. In less than 24 hours we reached our funding goal! Thank you so much for your amazing support! Loey #1 will be a reality! With funds in place, now is your opportunity to pre-order a first-run issue of the comic, plus contribute toward the fun stretch goals we have in mind. Check back soon for details!

 

"Be the hero someone sees today!"

Loey the Liger #1, or Loey the Liger and the Wizard's Tower, is a 22-page comic adventure about Loey the Liger, the mascot of the League of Enchantment charity cosplay group, written and illustrated by Ryan McConnell, published by YEET Comics.

Loey is a normal liger kid and a HUGE fan of the coolest superhero around, Mighty Tigon! But when she accidentally throws her smartphone into the creepy wizard tower next door while practicing her hero moves, she gets into a strange and magical situation she never would have expected! 

 

Also included in Loey #1 are two additional short stories - one featuring Lockjaw the Gator (by Bob Kroll and Charles E. Butler) and the debut adventure of Socky the Sock (by Shamus Smith and Greta Yuki). This brings the book up to 32 pages in total!

 

Loey #1 will have two variant covers - one by Clayton Murwin (The Hero Maker) and one by Bryan SilverBax (Loggerhead, Scout Comics). These will only be available in limited quantities so don't wait too long!

The book is entirely finished, we just need YOUR help getting it printed and distributed! We are beyond excited to bring Loey to you in comic form!
 

 

What's the League of Enchantment?

The League of Enchantment is a Michigan-based 501c3 non-profit with the mission to work together with local hospitals, Make-A-Wish, and community organizations and events to bring hope and smiles to kids (and kids at heart). Whether it is a smile, hug, photo, or a simple conversation with a child, we are here to make a difference in their lives, all through the power of cosplay.

All proceeds from the campaign after printing will go directly towards supporting the League and their outreach efforts. We hope to give out Loey comics to kids in the hospital once our superhero visits resume! 

For more information, please visit https://www.leagueofenchantment.org.

 

Stretch Goals!

If this campaign goes well we have several other fun things in the works, most importantly a Loey plush doll! However, to get these produced we will need to raise some extra money. Once we hit $2000 we will start production on little stuffed Loeys!

story:
City of Rot!

A NEWSPRINT EDITION OF THE BOOK HAS BEEN ADDED AND NOW ALL OTHER COPIES OF THE BOOK WILL BE PERFECT BOUND!!!

City of Rot is a black and white 48 page outlaw horror oneshot comic.

That's the whole story in one book!

Betrayed and left for dead by his motorcycle club, the Wizards of War. Hank awakes in jail during the onset of the zombie apocalypse. He escapes in the chaos and vows to hunt down the ranking members of the MC and pay them back for setting him up.

The world might die, but revenge doesn't!

48 pages of Bikers, babes, and bloodshed! in black and white!

Black and White interiors with a Full color cover!

Blood and guts, bullets and babes, zombies and bikers!

 

NEW ART ALERT!!

Illustrated by Matias Villalba and colored by Nick Welch

 

WIZARDS OF WAR CLUB CUT

 

 

 

Here's the Deal

We wanted to do something gritty, grimy, and balls to the wall gory. City of Rot is our love letter to grindhouse horror films and outlaw comics.

An X Rated zombies and bikers oneshot that would make the Sons of Anarchy shit their pants and the Walking Dead crawl back in their graves.

With your help Geoff and I can finish City of Rot and send you all a fun little horror oneshot.

 

Who's Who?

Heavy Hank - the hero of our story. Hank was the most ruthless enforcer to ever wear the WOW patch, loyal to the end. He's the guy you want standing next to you in battle, but if you cross him, he'll make sure he's the guy standing on your neck.

Darcy - a Bakersfield local, Darcy holed up in an old stripclub when the dead took the city. She's a scrappy chick with a loud mouth and a burning desire to wipe out the Wizards.

Otto - one of the Wizards road captains and the closest thing Hank has to a friend. A bit of a weapons expert and a drug connoisseur.

The Wizards of War - outlaw motorcycle club with chapters all over the country. City of Rot follows Hank and the Valley Falls chapter.

The Rotters - the living dead, relentless, hungry bastards. Destroy the brain or they'll eat yours.

Officer Vickers - he was a good cop before the dead started rising, then he met Hank.

 

"DARCY'S SECRET"

ILLUSTRATED BY JASON JOHNSON

COLORED BY MATT YACKEY

ART HAD TO BE TAKEN DOWN, SORRY!

 

The Rewards

City of Rot oneshot by Geoff Elkins & Spencer Desmond (All books signed by Spencer)

Digital Soundtrack by The Institute 91'

Zombie Cameo in the book

Motorcycle Club Member Cameo in the book

Uncensored Darcy Poster by Jason Johnson

Original Zombie Head Sketches by Spencer Desmond or Geoff Elkins

Original Art from Geoff Elkins, Spencer Desmond, Jason Johnson, and Jose Carrasquillo!

 

 

STRETCH GOALS

 

BOOKMARK @ $10,000 = Everyone gets a City of Rot bookmark! UNLOCKED!

ANOTHER INSTITUTE 91 TRACK @ $12,500 = A 6th track added to the digital OST!

HANK TRADING CARD @ $15,000 = Everyone gets a Hank card by Matias Villalba!

ANOTHER INSTITUTE 91 TRACK @ $17,500 = A 7th track added to the digital OST!

DARCY TRADING CARD @ $20,000 = Everyone gets a Darcy card by Matias Villalba!

 

Risks & Challenges

Our main challenges are timing and funding. Sticking to a schedule and making sure we hit deadlines. Currently City of Rot is Geoff's main project and he's actively working on pages daily. He is digitally penciling to save time and traditionally inking to yield the best results for quality art. Your backing eliminates a lot of the challenges for us upfront so we can focus on getting the book finished, printed, and fulfilled to you in a timely manner.

Other Ways You Can Help

PLEASE SHARE THE CAMPAIGN AND TELL A FRIEND!

SHARING IS FREE AND WORD OF MOUTH GOES A LONG WAY!

story:
What is Cloudscratcher?

Cloudscratcher is a webcomic throwback to 90's cartoons, emulating the look and feel of animated series and films of the time, featuring big adventure stories with a colorful cast of characters and an engaging story for readers both young and old. Likeable heroes, over-the-top villains, and plenty of toyetic designs!

Having been a labor of love for the past six years, Cloudscratcher has grown exponentially in readership, and is now nearing the finale of its fourth major story arc.

Volume 1

The Volume 1 hardcover is set to contain the first two story arcs (or Episodes) "Visitors and Venom" and "72 Hours," which come to a combined total of 7 chapters and 190 pages. Not only will there be various clean-ups and touch-ups of the pages to separate them from what is currently viewable on the website, but the book will also contain additional special features, such as exclusive artwork and side stories.

 

    The Impact

    As Cloudscratcher has grown in both size and audience, my goal is to see that growth through. This entails moving from simply a webcomic into a printed comic series, and even working on Cloudscratcher (and other comic projects) full time. But, to accomplish that, I'll need the support of current readers and a new, interested audience alike. 

     

    Risks & Challenges

    Simply migrating from the computer screen to the printed page is no simple task, I'm very well aware. This is why I've approached Vivid Publishing, and joined their team to have Cloudscratcher published by Vivid. But, while they may be handling the legwork on printing, fulfilling the campaign perks and shipping out books will fall squarely on my shoulders. This is a challenge I've already worked to prepare for, and should we reach our funding goal and no crisises arise, everything should move smoothly!

    But, in the event that something does happen, you can rest assured all backers will be informed and kept up to date every step of the way!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute financially, but want to help, just spreading the word to anyone you can will be more than enough! If you have a friend that seems like someone who'd dig Cloudscratcher, show them this page! Know someone who's a big supporter of indie comics? Send them our way! Every little bit helps.

    What We Need & What You Get

     

    The goals for this campaign are based on the funding needs for production and shipping. printing costs, mailing fees, the basics. This allows us not only to get books into backers' hands, but to retailers as well! Comic shops, bookstores, convention sales, etc. 

    With your help, Cloudscratcher can grow and reach a larger audience, letting even more readers feel like a kid on Saturday morning all over again!

If you can't contribute financially, but want to help, just spreading the word to anyone you can will be more than enough! If you have a friend that seems like someone who'd dig Cloudscratcher, show them this page! Know someone who's a big supporter of indie comics? Send them our way! Every little bit helps.
What We Need & What You Get The goals for this campaign are based on the funding needs for production and shipping. printing costs, mailing fees, the basics. This allows us not only to get books into backers' hands, but to retailers as well! Comic shops, bookstores, convention sales, etc. With your help, Cloudscratcher can grow and reach a larger audience, letting even more readers feel like a kid on Saturday morning all over again!

story:
Ella is an orphan that has been raised by a group of demon hunters called the Kulling. She been trained to kill demons but never raise her blade to a human. Childhood trauma kicked in after seeing a village attacked by raiders, Ella viscously kills the raiders. Breaking the rules of the Kulling means death. Mazos, her adopted father couldn't kill her. He burned her Kulling seal off of her back, leaving her alone, barely alive. Now, she's alone excommunicated out for blood be it a raider, demon, or hunter.

 

WHAT ARE YOU BACKING?

  • This is a 32 page full color comic, single (first) issue of a series.
  • Fantasy genre
  • Mature Readers

 

Marcel Dupree - Writer

Owns and operates Evoluzione Publishing, which produces comics like  Le Fay  Vetita and Delilah Blast.  He also edited Punch Drunk from Arcana Comics.

 

Mannix Francisco - Artist

Mannix Francisco spent 20 years working for TOEI Animation Studio Philippines as animiator and quality control on titles like Dragonball, Sailormoon and One Piece before trying his luck on comic book art. He has worked with publishers such as Big Dog Ink and Behemoth.

story:
THE STORY

In the near future an eccentric tech genius creates a teleportation device and unlocks the mysteries of time travel. He's immediately confronted by his future self and drawn into an epic quest to save the world by destroying his inspiration for the invention, the 1986 remake of "The Fly." 

This story is a love letter to the time travel movies I grew up with. It's Back to the Future meets The Terminator with a dash of my own crazy mixed in!

Be Afraid... Be Very Afraid.

 

PRESS

CHECK OUT THIS INTERVIEW WITH MY FRIENDS AT POPXP!

 
And this Q & A with Comic Frontline:
https://comicfrontline.com/2021/02/21/kickstart-the-weekend-with-flytrap-a-time-travel-one-shot/?fbclid=IwAR2eJ1-tTyAnYUlnVwpBL9SoeiAj7W98uVtNh59vrzlQfZaFc10OUzJrPvA



THE PREVIEW

Here is an 11 page preview of the book. Art and lettering by Marcelo Biott, colors by Robert Nugent. Current lettering is temporary and will be updated prior to printing. 



THE BOOK

Flytrap is a 60-page, full color,  TPB (trade paperback) Graphic Novel 

This is a one-shot, stand-alone story, but also part of a trilogy of stand-alone time travel stories that will be interconnected.

This book is the story of Albert, the creator of time travel. 

I strive to create books that only get better with every read. Although Flytrap is steeped in heavy, thought-provoking sci-fi themes, it's also a crazy fun story with beautiful artwork, funny dialogue, and quirky characters that will draw you back to enjoy it again and again.

 

2 COVERS FOR JUST $30

We have 2 amazing covers. You can pick up each one separately, or if you want the best deal for your dollars, you can get both for just $30 including free domestic shipping!!
 

 

 

 

JOE ST.PIERRE - VARIANT COVER!

Hey there spidey fans! The amazing Joe St.Pierre has been kind enough to grace Village Comics' newest creation with a beautiful variant cover!!

This White Rabbit Comics Shop Exclusive adds a new layer of beauty to the book, and will be a wonderful gem of Pierre's work to add to your collection. Make sure you pick up an extra copy or two in the add-on section during checkout!!

Joe St.Pierre began his comic book career at Valiant Comics, as penciler of RAI, and co-creator of SECRET WEAPONS. He has sold over 2 million comic books, as a writer and artist for Marvel, DC (Aquaman, Green Lantern), Image (Megahurtz), IDW (Transformers), Boom (Power Rangers) and Dynamite.

Joe has the distinction of penciling the most #1 issues featuring SPIDER-MAN and/or the Spider-Man family.

Joe’s publishing company, Astronaut Ink, highlights his own creator-owned properties BOLD BLOOD, MEGAHURTZ® and most recently NEW ZODIAX. The NEW ZODIAX Graphic Novel first printing sold out, and thanks to two successful Kickstarter campaigns, the second printing is now available thru comic shops and the Astronaut Ink website.

Websites:
www.astronautink.com
www.popartproperties.com

 

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING

DUE TO SKYROCKETING INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING RATES, PHYSICAL REWARDS ARE ONLY AVAILABLE TO BACKERS LOCATED IN THE U.S. AND CANADA. 

IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE OF U.S. AND CANADA, IT'S SAFE TO ASSUME YOUR ADDITIONAL SHIPPING COST WILL BE SOMEWHERE BETWEEN $30 AND $50 DEPENDING ON HOW MANY BOOK YOU ARE BUYING.

(PLEASE FEEL FREE TO BACK AT THE DIGITAL LEVEL AND CONTACT ME WITH A LIST OF BOOKS YOU WOULD LIKE AND THE COUNTRY I WOULD BE SHIPPING TO, AND I WILL CALCULATE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING)

 

 

TIMELINE

Artwork for Flytrap is about a third of the way complete. Once we are funded, production will go into full swing, and we hope to have the books in your hand no later than May.

The delivery time of the rewards is an estimate. You will get your books as quick as possible without sacrificing quality. Rest assured that we have done this all may times before. I promise you will be floored by the quality of these books. 

 

 

READ NOOK FOR FREE

Want to experience the quality of story you will be getting from this artist and writer? Come read the complete Nook graphic novel for FREE!

Fleeing the oppression of WWII Germany, Avery and her parents move to a remote town on the border of France. It is here she finds her new best friend, a cat named Nook. But, there is more to this cat than it seems.

A dark and twisted history longs to be revealed. Avery is swept up into a deadly cycle of violence and will come to both fear and love her fuzzy new friend as the history of her new home is revealed.

Click here to: READ NOOK NOW!

 

 

THE TEAM

CALEB THUSAT

Creator/Writer

Stay-at-home Dad and writer/creator of Alter-Life, ZED, and Nook, I'm a former filmmaker turned comic book creator. I'm looking to bring unique and exciting stories to the vast, colorful world of the independent comic industry.

I have run 13 successful kickstarter campaigns in the past 5 years. I strive to make great books and always make sure my backers get the best deal and the best quality for supporting my projects.

www.villagecomicbooks.com

MARCELO BIOTT

Artist/Letterer

Marcelo Biott is an artist born and raised in Chicago. His art is heavily inspired by his life long love for comics, science fiction stories, and every bit of pop culture he can get his hands on. He creates images and stories you've never thought of, but wish you did. He enjoys robots, hot wings, and writing/illustrating his comic InfraCity.

Website: https://www.themarcelo.com

Infracity Webcomic: http://infracity.thecomicseries.com

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/infracity

ROBERT NUGENT

Colorist

Hello everyone, I am Robert Nugent, the crazy colorist of this intense book. I’ve been working in comics for 8 years and I hope to do this for many more years to come. I’ve worked with many independent publishers including Boom!, Dynamite Entertainment, IDW Publishing, Alterna, Source Point Press, Vulture Comics, Broken Icon Comics, Forge Creation, Advent Comics, among many others. In 2016 I won The Best Colorist award at Alternate Showcase of Animation and Comics poll awards.You can see my more recent work at www.instagram.com/rnugentcolors.

story:
Are you new here? Have you never read LONESTAR before? Well, let me make backing issue 3 an easier decision for you by making issue 1 FREE!  HERE is the PDF link to the first issue of LONESTAR!  If you like it, please consider backing the rest of the series! -Mike

 

ALSO ON INDIEGOGO: MONSTER HUNT 2: LET'S GET KRAKEN! 
LONESTAR, BIGFOOT BILL, and NEXUS join forces to save the earth!

Written by Mike Baron, art by Matthew Weldon. CLICK HERE FOR MORE!

Hello! And welcome to my next LONESTAR Indiegogo campaign!  My name is Mike S. Miller, I'm a 28 year veteran of the comic book industry, best known for my artwork in the NYTimes best selling, and #1 digital comic book in the world, INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US, and INJUSTICE 2 for DC COMICS.  I'm also still the cover artist for A GAME OF THRONES.

 

Injustice: Gods Among Us. The most iconic image from the series, by Mike S. Miller

"And Rhaegar Died", the first official lithograph from the Game of Thrones book series in 1993

I'm from San Diego, California, where I live with my amazing and beautiful wife and 5 insane children who pull me in every direction!  I've gone rogue from the mainstream comics plantation, and have struck out on this new venture to reshape the very nature of comicdom itself!  What's that you say?  Aiming a little high, am I?  Well, I figure if I aim for the moon, I might hit the top of the mountain.  But either way, it's a long, steep climb, and I'll need your help to keep this thing going!

LONESTAR: MIND OF THE MONSTER

Part 3 of the HEART, SOUL, and MIND trilogy, LONESTAR: MIND of the MONSTER takes us into the past as we discover the origin of the series villain SVAROG. Born in 12th century Rus, a natural-born vampire who discovers his needs and his weaknesses, how to survive and thrive in a world run by humans... and how his kind can take advantage, and even rule over them without tearing each other apart in the process! Then we return to the ultimate face-off between Lonestar and Svarog in the final, epic battle between the vampire pride and the Unknown Soldiers! 

FULL COLOR 48pages

If you haven't gotten the first two books, and you want to catch up before reading MOTM, there are both digital and physical options to pick them up and enjoy the story!

I've contacted industry legends and long time friends to bring you some truly exceptional covers for this concluding chapter to the LONESTAR trilogy: Mind of the Monster! These covers include:

Cover A: Kim Jung Gi with colors by Kelsey Shannon

Cover B: Mike S. Miller: Final Fight

Cover C: Khari Evans

Cover D: Mike S. Miller: Fallen Angel 'John Byrne Death of Phoenix Homage cover'

Cover E: Paolo Pantalena With 'Wolverine Homage after Leinil Francis Yu'

We're keeping the perks simple, and the prices as low as feasible, please check out the perks down the side of the campaign page!

Please check the perks out for more specific details!

STRETCH GOALS will be announced as we near them, including new trading cards, postcards, stickers, and more!

Preview pages below!

 

 

SHI, Kamen America, Daym Drops, Cyberfrog, Earthworm Jim, Titan, Black Flag, Black Tide, Expendables, Cash Grab, Jawbreakers, Graveyard Shift, Starlight Cats,  Plot Holes, Thomas River, Dreamkeepers, Impossible Stars, Chenoo, Replicator, Gold Digger, Starblades, Reignbow the brute,  Alterna, Inglorious Rex

story:
For thousands of years, the death-defying heroine known as the Amazon Arrow has protected our realm from the forces of evil. Now, she is missing, her identity erased, her true power forgotten. The race is on to find her in time to prevent an invasion by the Underworld's monstrous undying army. Will a trio of glamorous and sexy warrior-women sacrifice everything to save us all? Or will an eternal love give rise to a new age of hell on Earth? Peril and adventure in the modern world collides with ancient mythology. This is Amazon Arrow: Immortal Reign. Back it today!

Interior Sample Pages...

Digital Add-On's

All Stretch Goals Unlocked!

 

Recurve Comics is going to be producing a 60-page perfect-bound graphic novel with a sturdy paper stock, a high-gloss cover, and printed on a professional press just like the books you'll find at your local comic shop. Your book will be securely packaged and shipped to you in a sturdy Gemini mailer. We are committed to delivering a book that you'll be proud to display on your shelf and read over and over again. You'll also find several Digital Specials filled with gorgeous illustrations and photos. You can purchase them individually as add-on's during checkout for $10 each, or look for them in bundles for big savings. We need your help to print this book and to turn this dream into a reality. Thanks for checking out the campaign!

Amazon Arrow by Hibren

 

Amazon Arrow Chibi by Doggozilla

Thanks so much for your support!

story:
You are joining us at the beginning of our journey. 

"Out from Under", a new  American hero will emerge, but not before his moral compass is tested to the limit and he tries his hand at quenching his thirst for revenge.  Your contribution will help us take our wrongfully accused Navy SEAL protagonist, John Liuzzo from the depths of living hell to eternal glory.

While we come from humble beginnings, we believe our drive and imagination will lead to endless possibilities and an everlasting comic book franchise will be born. Your contribution will bring us one step closer to our goal of completing six issues of the 'Out from Under' comic book series.

We didn't want to promise something that we couldn't deliver, so we decided to complete the first issue, front to cover, fully inked, and ready for print.  This includes 24 pages of story,  3 pages of our protagonist's journal entries,  and the newspaper article that summarizes our protagonist's demise.  All that is left, is for us to meet a minimum order to justify the printing costs and we can immediately mail copies to our friends and fans

 

Please help us get the word out and share the legend!

While we come from humble beginnings, we believe our drive and imagination will lead to endless possibilities and an everlasting comic book franchise will be born. Your contribution will bring us one step closer to our goal of completing six issues of the 'Out from Under' comic book series.
We didn't want to promise something that we couldn't deliver, so we decided to complete the first issue, front to cover, fully inked, and ready for print.  This includes 24 pages of story,  3 pages of our protagonist's journal entries,  and the newspaper article that summarizes our protagonist's demise.  All that is left, is for us to meet a minimum order to justify the printing costs and we can immediately mail copies to our friends and fans
 

Please help us get the word out and share the legend!

story:
***Referral contest***

The prize is a one-of-a-kind 4-pack of "black logo" 4"x6" foil prints (silver, gold, red, and blue - pictured above)!!! Winner must be a backer, and must log into your Indiegogo account, and from there, share the Irth Campaign on social media!!! Everyone who visits and backs the campaign from there, will be a referral for you!!! Whoever gets the most referrals wins the unique collector's item!!! (never to be printed again!!!)

Short Summary

Hi, my name is Daniel Carpenter, and I'm just an aspiring writer who is creating the type of comic book that I would buy and read myself. I love comics, Dungeons & Dragons, and murder mysteries, so I found an amazing team of illustrators, and put those elements together! I hope you like it.

Irth is a 22 page, full color comic book, that takes place on our planet in the year 2020, if fantasy creatures and monsters had existed and evolved with us. The first arc revolves around the murder of a Goblin citizen, and each issue will be illustrated by three artists, following different characters as their stories intersect:

The cappuccino loving RH Stewart, who hails from England, is illustrating the Elf and Dwarf Detectives who are investigating the case!

The enthusiastic Brandon Baselice, who hails from New Hampshire, is illustrating the Goblin, Ogre, and Half-Elf friends who are LARPing!

The robot loving Katy Parken, who hails from New York, is illustrating the Mayor of New Yorc's storyline, and lettering the comic book, too!

And, the multi-talented Javier Sarmiento, who also hails from New York, is creating the beautiful covers for the arc!

You can find out some more information on the website: www.irthcomic.com

What We Need & What You Get

I'm humbly hoping to raise enough money to cover the costs to the artists, who I've been paying out of my pocket, and for printing, packaging, shipping, etc. I am also committed to putting out the most excellent quality material that I can, and to giving each contributor products that they will be happily satisfied with.

There are lots of donation levels to choose from, with lots of fun swag available, and there will be stretch goals added as higher goals are reached! Also, if my funding goal of $5000 is reached, I will be sending ALL backers a free silver foil cover of the comic book as a thank you!!!

Don't forget to check back periodically for added pictures, perks, contests, and amazing stretch goal bonuses!!!

Risks & Challenges

I believe honesty and integrity are very important, and I promise to do my best to get your products to you in great shape and in a timely manner. If, for some unforeseen circumstance I can't get the products out, I promise to reimburse every backer! 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know anyone who loves comic books and/or Dungeons & Dragons, please share this page with them. Any help is appreciated.

Everyone who visits and backs the campaign from there, will be a referral for you!!! Whoever gets the most referrals wins the unique collector's item!!! (never to be printed again!!!)
Short Summary
Hi, my name is Daniel Carpenter, and I'm just an aspiring writer who is creating the type of comic book that I would buy and read myself. I love comics, Dungeons & Dragons, and murder mysteries, so I found an amazing team of illustrators, and put those elements together! I hope you like it.
Irth is a 22 page, full color comic book, that takes place on our planet in the year 2020, if fantasy creatures and monsters had existed and evolved with us. The first arc revolves around the murder of a Goblin citizen, and each issue will be illustrated by three artists, following different characters as their stories intersect:
The cappuccino loving RH Stewart, who hails from England, is illustrating the Elf and Dwarf Detectives who are investigating the case!
The enthusiastic Brandon Baselice, who hails from New Hampshire, is illustrating the Goblin, Ogre, and Half-Elf friends who are LARPing!
The robot loving Katy Parken, who hails from New York, is illustrating the Mayor of New Yorc's storyline, and lettering the comic book, too!
And, the multi-talented Javier Sarmiento, who also hails from New York, is creating the beautiful covers for the arc!
You can find out some more information on the website: www.irthcomic.com

What We Need & What You Get
I'm humbly hoping to raise enough money to cover the costs to the artists, who I've been paying out of my pocket, and for printing, packaging, shipping, etc. I am also committed to putting out the most excellent quality material that I can, and to giving each contributor products that they will be happily satisfied with.
There are lots of donation levels to choose from, with lots of fun swag available, and there will be stretch goals added as higher goals are reached! Also, if my funding goal of $5000 is reached, I will be sending ALL backers a free silver foil cover of the comic book as a thank you!!!
Don't forget to check back periodically for added pictures, perks, contests, and amazing stretch goal bonuses!!!

Risks & Challenges
I believe honesty and integrity are very important, and I promise to do my best to get your products to you in great shape and in a timely manner. If, for some unforeseen circumstance I can't get the products out, I promise to reimburse every backer! 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you know anyone who loves comic books and/or Dungeons & Dragons, please share this page with them. Any help is appreciated.

story:
The Story

When a technological plague destroys the world, a handful of survivors descend on San Francisco, only to discover that they have only 24 hours before they, too, will be wiped out. Hoping to leave a legacy that will outlast them, they do what any good San Franciscan would; make art out of it.  

Unfortunately, a group of nihilistic programmers have their own deadly agenda and are seeking to expedite the apocalypse. Can the rival factions collaborate on a final act of creation or will humanity’s enduring epitaph be nothing more than sound and fury? 

Ghost Band is a blistering meditation on our self-indulgent tech obsession wrapped in a coming-of-age adventure tale. Silicon Valley meets The Day After. 

The Creative Team

From a creative team of California ex-pats comes a biting satire of the tech industry and the cultural decimation it leaves in its wake.

Jason McNamara ( co-creator / writer) is the graphic novel author of Nocturnal Commissions, The Cicada, SUCKER, The Rattler, The Crossing, Abandon, From Mars with Love, The Martian Confederacy, Short Hand, Continuity, First Moon and Less Than Hero. After being squeezed out of San Francisco he landed in Portland, Oregon where he teaches comic book scriptwriting at Pacific Northwest College of the Arts.   

Anke Gladnick (co-creator / illustrator) is an illustrator and comics artist who grew up in California and somehow found their way to Portland, Oregon. Through a mix of collaged analog and digital elements, Anke’s work is both visually and conceptually layered with a focus on the surreal and is inspired by dreams, nostalgia and a sense of poignancy. Their client list includes the likes of NBC, Washington Post, NPR and The Intercept. Anke is also part of the successfully crowd funded anthology “No Refunds”, featuring rising talents in sequential art from the Pacific Northwest. 

The Campaign

The goal of this Indy Go Go campaign is to support the creation of an original 96-page graphic novel and to ship it to backers.  We are going to produce and release the work as four digital issues over the next year and then collect the entire story in a printed graphic novel and ship it to backers. This is an ambitious undertaking for us and will require a year of work. 

Previously I have crowd funded The Rattler, Sucker V1, The Cicada, Sucker V2, and Nocturnal Commissions. I am confident that I can manage this project and create a successful experience for all of our backers. Until the last copy ships, I work for you. 

Risks & Challenges

The entire 96 page Ghost Band collection is going to be completed over the next year. It is hard to predict what global and domestic issues we will have to work around during our fulfillment phase. We have budgeted for an assumed increase in shipping and printing costs. We will be transparent and proactive in our communication and problem-solving.

Follow us on tour!

Twitter

@JasonMcNamara

@AnkeGladnick

story:
Relentless. Powerful. Comics.

 

Legendary comic book artist Bart Sears created Ominous Press with one simple goal in mind: to create relentless, powerful comics.

Over the last twenty-five years (and counting!), joined by friends and fellow industry icons Ron Marz, Andy Smith and Sean HusVar, Ominous Press has provided readers with cutting edge art and stories such as Giantkillers, Demi-God, Dread Gods and more!

To celebrate the 25th anniversary of Ominous,  the gang has decided to collect the greatest works of art produced over the course of the company's history, by many of the best artists to ever hold a pencil,  in one stunning, full color 330-page hardcover volume!

                             The "Naked" cover art for The Ominous 25th Anniversary HC

Not only is the Art Of Ominous Press a stunning collection of mindblowing artwork, it also serves as both a visual and oral history of Ominous Press, featuring insight and testimonials from many of the talents that have shaped the company's vision. 

 

                                                           Bart Sears concept drawing of "Zeus"

                                       The many characters and worlds of Ominous

Always looking towards the future, Ominous has also turned their focus towards teaching the craft of comic book art to a new generation of creators (that will someday work with Ominous!) through our two volumes of instructional art books: Brutes and Babes: Drawing Powerful Heroes.

The Art Of Ominous Press gives fans an inside look at the early days of Ominous, from when it was still a  mad idea taking shape in the mind of Bart Sears through the company's early days producing concept art for Marvel/Toybiz and sequential work for Wizard Magazine. 

                                                 (Early Ominous art by Andy Smith circa 1994)

Along the way, Ominous Press has been joined by a virtual all-star team of some of the greatest artists ever to work in the comic book field: Neal Adams, George Perez, Jim Starlin, Rick Leonardi, Tom Raney, Jerry Ordway, Kelley Jones, Ron Lim and many, many more, both on individual projects as well as our critically acclaimed Black Book series of art books. 

                                                  The award-winning Black Book series

                                      Tom Raney, Bart Sears and Andy Smith join forces!

 

                                                   (previously unseen Ominous "Tablet" art)

Packed with stunning imagery, loaded with behind-the-scenes anecdotes and commentary by the team at Ominous, the Ominous Press 25th Anniversary Art Book is a glorious celebration of a quarter century of Relentless, Powerful Comics!

                                                 (Aaron Lopresti "ARRA" character sketch)

Packed with page after page of eyeball-searing artwork, The Art Of Ominous Press contains never before seen artwork, as well as a tantalizing glimpse ahead to the next twenty five years of innovative storytelling. Available exclusively through this IndieGoGo campaign now, along with a full offering of product from the Ominous Press publishing history.

 

FUNDING

Funds raised through the course of this campaign will go towards the printing of the Art Of Ominous 25th anniversary hardcover.

Ominous Press and its parent company, Creation.Ink, have a great deal of practical experience running and fulfilling crowdfunding campaigns on both leading platforms. We don't anticipate any substantial delays in the production of this project. Our fulfillment team already has all of the ancillary products being offered through this campaign in our warehouse. Once the Art Of Ominous 25th anniversary hardcover is received from the printing house, packages will immediately be sent out to backers of this campaign.

This project can only come to life through the help of you, its backers. Please help us share this campaign by posting links to your social media accounts! Together, we'll celebrate 25 years of RELENTLESS. POWERFUL. COMICS!

STAFF

Ominous Press/Creation.Ink
Sean HusVar (CEO, Publisher)
Bart Sears (Chief Creative Officer)
Ron Marz (Editor-in-Chief)
Andy Smith (Art Director)
Keith Champagne (Project Manager)
Chris Scioli (International gigolo)

 Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ominouspress
Web: ominouspress.com
 Twitter: @ominouspress

                                                                   SHIPPING

Shipping fees are based on the cost for our fulfillment partners to ship from their hubs to you. We will ship your rewards to the hubs of our fulfillment partners. From there, our partners will ship out packages to you as soon as they are received.  PLEASE NOTE: shipping costs may increase due to circumstances beyond our control, or via the addition of extra copies and items, which are accounted for in the add-on section of the campaign.
